original: 11. Añjaniyaṃ itthipurisacatuppadasakuṇarūpaṃ vā mālākammalatākammamakaradantakagomuttakaaḍḍhacandakādibhedaṃ

analyzed: ārakaṇṭake pi vaṭṭamaṇikam vā aññam vā vaṇṇa maṭṭham na vaṭṭati gīvā ayam pana pariccheda lekhā

analyzed: senāsane pana dvāra kavāṭa vāta pānaka vāṭa ādīsu sabba ratana mayam pi vaṇṇam aṭṭhakammam

analyzed: mā sāmaggim bhindittha tumhākam senāsanam katam pi kata ṭṭhāne na ṭhassati iti sace

original: Kathaṃ parammukhāvikappanā hoti? Pattānaṃ tatheva ekabahubhāvaṃ sannihitāsannihitabhāvañca
analyzed: katham parammukhā a vikappanā hoti pattānam tathā iva eka bahu bhāvam sannihita asannihita bhāvam ca

original: ñatvā “imaṃ patta”nti vā “ime patte”ti vā “etaṃ patta”nti vā “ete patte”ti vā vatvā
analyzed: ñatvā imam pattanti vā ime patta iti vā etam pattanti vā ete patta iti vā vatvā

original: “tuyhaṃ vikappanatthāya dammī”ti vattabbaṃ. Tena vattabbo “ko te mitto vā sandiṭṭho
analyzed: tuyham vikappana tthāya dammi iti vattabbam tena vattabbaḥ kaḥ te mittaḥ vā sandiṭṭhaḥ

original: vā”ti. Tato itarena purimanayena “tisso bhikkhū”ti vā…pe… “tissā sāmaṇerī”ti vā vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: vā ti tatas itarena purima nayena tissaḥ bhikkhū iti vāpe tissā sāmaṇerī iti vā vattabbam

original: Puna tena bhikkhunā “ahaṃ tissassa bhikkhuno dammī”ti vā…pe… “tissāya sāmaṇeriyā
analyzed: puna tena bhikkhunā aham tissassa bhikkhunaḥ dammi iti vāpe tissāya sāmaṇeriyā

original: dammī”ti vā vattabbaṃ, ayaṃ parammukhāvikappanā. Ettāvatā nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati, paribhogādīsu
analyzed: dammi iti vā vattabbam ayam parammukhā a vikappanā ettāvatā nidhetum vaṭṭati paribhoga ādīsu

original: pana ekampi na vaṭṭati. Tena pana bhikkhunā dutiyasammukhāvikappanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
analyzed: pana ekam pi na vaṭṭati tena pana bhikkhunā vutta nayena iva

original: “itthannāmassa santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti vutte
analyzed: itthannāmassa santakam paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayam vā karohi iti vutte

original: paccuddhāro nāma hoti, tato pabhuti paribhogādayopi vaṭṭanti. Ayaṃ vikappane nayo.
analyzed: paccuddhāraḥ nāma hoti tatas pabhuti paribhoga ādayaḥ api vaṭṭanti ayam vikappane nayo

original: 50. Evaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā vikappetvā ca paribhuñjantena patte bhinne kiṃ kātabbanti?
analyzed: evam adhiṭṭhahitvā vikappetvā ca paribhuñjantena patte bhinne kim kātabban ti

original: Yassa patte rājimukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulappamāṇā na hoti tena na kiñci kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: yassa patte rāji mukha vaṭṭitaḥ heṭṭhā dvi aṅgula ppamāṇā na hoti tena na kiñci kātabbam

original: Yassa pana tādisā ekāpi rāji hoti, tena tassā rājiyā heṭṭhimapariyante pattavedhakena
analyzed: yassa pana tādisā ekā api rāji hoti tena tassāḥ rājiyāḥ heṭṭhima pariyante patta vedhakena

original: vijjhitvā pacitvā suttarajjukamakacirajjukādīhi vā tipusuttakena vā bandhitvā taṃ
analyzed: vijjhitvā pacitvā sutta rajjuka makacirajjuka ādīhi vā tipu suttakena vā bandhitvā tam

original: bandhanaṃ āmisassa alagganatthaṃ tipupaṭṭena vā kenaci vā baddhasilesena paṭicchādetabbaṃ.
analyzed: bandhanam āmisassa a laggana attham tipu paṭṭena vā kenaci vā baddha silesena paṭicchādetabbam

original: So ca patto adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbo. Sukhumaṃ vā chiddaṃ katvā bandhitabbo.
analyzed: so ca pattaḥ adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbaḥ su khumam vā chiddam katvā bandhitabbaḥ

original: Suddhehi pana madhukasitthakalākhāsajjurasādīhi bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati, phāṇitaṃ jhāpetvā
analyzed: suddhehi pana madhuka sitthaka lākhā sajju rasa ādīhi bandhitum na vaṭṭati phāṇitam jhāpetvā

original: pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Mukhavaṭṭisamīpe pana pattavedhakena vijjhiyamāno
analyzed: pāsāṇa cuṇṇena bandhitum vaṭṭati mukhavaṭṭi samīpe pana patta vedhakena vijjhiyamāno

original: kapālassa bahalattā bhijjati, tasmā heṭṭhā vijjhitabbo. Yassa pana dve rājiyo, ekāyeva
analyzed: kapālassa bahala ttā bhijjati tasmā heṭṭhā vijjhitabbaḥ yassa pana dve rājiyo ekāyā iva

original: vā caturaṅgulā, tassa dve bandhanāni dātabbāni. Yassa tisso, ekāyeva vā chaḷaṅgulā,
analyzed: vā catur aṅgulā tassa dve bandhanāni dātabbāni yassa tissaḥ ekāya iva vā chaṣ aṅgulā

original: tassa tīṇi. Yassa catasso, ekāyeva vā aṭṭhaṅgulā, tassa cattāri. Yassa pañca, ekāyeva
analyzed: tassa tīṇi yassa catasso ekāya iva vā aṭṭha aṅgulā tassa cattāri yassa pañca ekāya iva

original: vā dasaṅgulā, so baddhopi abaddhopi apattoyeva, añño viññāpetabbo. Esa tāva mattikāpatte vinicchayo.
analyzed: vā dasa aṅgulā so baddhaḥ api a baddhaḥ api a pattaḥ yeva aññaḥ viññāpetabbo esa tāva mattikā patte vinicchayo

original: Ayopatte pana sacepi pañca vā atirekāni vā chiddāni honti, tāni ca ayacuṇṇena vā
analyzed: aya upatte pana sace pi pañca vā atirekāni vā chiddāni honti tāni ca aya cuṇṇena vā

original: āṇiyā vā lohamaṇḍalakena vā baddhāni maṭṭhāni honti, sveva patto paribhuñjitabbo,
analyzed: āṇiyā vā loha maṇḍalakena vā baddhāni maṭṭhāni honti su eva pattaḥ paribhuñjitabbo

original: añño na viññāpetabbo. Atha pana ekampi chiddaṃ mahantaṃ hoti, lohamaṇḍalakena baddhampi
analyzed: aññaḥ na viññāpetabbaḥ atha pana ekam pi chiddam mahantam hoti loha maṇḍalakena baddham pi

original: maṭṭhaṃ na hoti, patte āmisaṃ laggati, akappiyo hoti, ayaṃ apatto, añño viññāpetabbo.
analyzed: maṭṭham na hoti patte āmisam laggati akappiyaḥ hoti ayam a pattaḥ aññaḥ viññāpetabbo

original: Viññāpentena ca saṅghavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne pañcabandhaneneva pattena aññaṃ pattaṃ
analyzed: viññāpentena ca saṅgha vasena pavārita ṭṭhāne pañcabandhanena iva pattena aññam pattam

original: viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, puggalavasena pana pavāritaṭṭhāne ūnapañcabandhanenāpi vaṭṭati.
analyzed: viññāpetum vaṭṭati puggala vasena pana pavārita ṭṭhāne ūna pañca bandhanena api vaṭṭati

original: Pattaṃ labhitvā paribhuñjantena ca yāgurandhanarajanapacanādinā aparibhogena na paribhuñjitabbo,
analyzed: pattam labhitvā paribhuñjantena ca a paribhogena na paribhuñjitabbaḥ

original: antarāmagge pana byādhimhi uppanne aññasmiṃ bhājane asati mattikāya limpetvā yāguṃ
analyzed: antarāmagge pana byādhimhi uppanne aññasmin bhājane asati mattikāya limpetvā yāgum

original: vā pacituṃ udakaṃ vā tāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Mañcapīṭhachattanāgadantakādike adesepi na
analyzed: vā pacitum udakam vā tāpetum vaṭṭati mañca pīṭha chatta nāga dantaka ādike adese pi na

original: nikkhipitabbo. Pattassa hi nikkhipanadeso “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pattādhāraka”ntiādinā
analyzed: nikkhipitabbo pattassa hi nikkhipana desaḥ anujānāmi bhikkhave patta ādhāraka nti ādinā

original: nayena khandhake vuttoyeva.
analyzed: nayena khandhake vuttā uyā iva

original: Iti pāḷimuttakavinayavinicchayasaṅgahe
analyzed: iti pāḷimuttaka vinaya vinicchaya saṅgahe

original: Adhiṭṭhānavikappanavinicchayakathā samattā.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāna vikappana vinicchaya kathā samattā

original: 9. Cīvaravippavāsavinicchayakathā
analyzed: cīvara vippavāsa vinicchaya kathā

original: 51. Cīvarenavināvāsoti ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatarena

original: vippavāso. Evaṃ adhiṭṭhitesu hi tīsu cīvaresu ekenapi vinā vasituṃ na vaṭṭati, vasantassa

analyzed: hattha pāse katvā vasitabbam gāma nivesana odosita aḍḍamāḷa pāsāda hammiya nāvāsattha khetta dhañña karaṇa ārāma vihāra rukkha mūla ajjhokāsesu

original: pana ayaṃ viseso – sace ekassa rañño gāmabhojakassa vā santako gāmo hoti, yena kenaci
analyzed: pana ayam visesaḥ sace ekassa raññaḥ gāma bhojakassa vā santakaḥ gāmaḥ hoti yena kenacid

analyzed: pākārena vā vatiyā vā parikhāya vā parikkhittaḥ ca evarūpe gāme cīvaram nikkhipitvā

original: gāmabbhantare yattha katthaci yathārucitaṭṭhāne aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana
analyzed: gām abbhantare yattha katthaci yathārucita ṭṭhāne aruṇam uṭṭhāpetum vaṭṭati sace pana

original: aparikkhitto hoti, evarūpe gāme yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tasmiṃ vatthabbaṃ,

original: Sace nānārājūnaṃ vā bhojakānaṃ vā gāmo hoti vesālīkusinārādisadiso parikkhitto ca,
analyzed: sace nānā rājūnam vā bhojakānam vā gāmaḥ hoti vesālī kusināra ādi sadiso parikkhitto ca

original: evarūpe gāme yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tattha vā vatthabbaṃ, tattha saddasaṅghaṭṭanena

analyzed: vā jana sambādhena vā vasitum a sakkontena sabhāye vā vatthabbam nagara dvāra mūle vā

original: Tatrāpi vasituṃ asakkontena yattha katthaci phāsukaṭṭhāne vasitvā antoaruṇe āgamma

analyzed: nikkhipati tena purima nayena iva sabhāye vā vatthabbam dvāra mūle vā tesam hattha pāse vā vasitabbam

original: Sace nagarassa bahūnipi dvārāni honti bahūni ca sabhāyāni, sabbattha vasituṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: sace nagarassa bahūni api dvārāni honti bahūni ca sabhāyāni sabbattha vasitum na vaṭṭati

analyzed: yassā pana vīthiyā cīvaram ṭhapitam yam tassā sammukha ṭṭhāne sabhāyam ca dvāram ca

original: tassa sabhāyassa ca dvārassa ca hatthapāse vasitabbaṃ. Evañhi sati sakkā cīvarassa
analyzed: tassa sabhāyassa ca dvārassa ca hattha pāse vasitabbam evam hi sati sakkā cīvarassa

original: pavattiṃ jānituṃ. Sabhāyaṃ pana gacchantena yassa āpaṇikassa hatthe nikkhittaṃ, sace
analyzed: pavattim jānitum sabhāyam pana gacchantena yassa āpaṇikassa hatthe nikkhittam sace

original: so taṃ cīvaraṃ atiharitvā ghare nikkhipati, vīthihatthapāso na rakkhati, gharassa

original: hatthapāse vatthabbaṃ. Sace mahantaṃ gharaṃ hoti dve vīthiyo pharitvā ṭhitaṃ, purato
analyzed: hattha pāse vatthabbam sace mahantam gharam hoti dve vīthiyaḥ pharitvā ṭhitam puratas

original: vā pacchato vā hatthapāseyeva aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ. Sabhāye nikkhipitvā pana sabhāye
analyzed: vā pacchatas vā hattha pāseya iva aruṇam uṭṭhāpetabbam sabhāye nikkhipitvā pana sabhāye

analyzed: gharassa vā hattha pāse vatthabbam

original: antonivesane cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā antonivesane vatthabbaṃ. Sace aparikkhittaṃ, yasmiṃ

original: vā gabbhassa vā gharadvāramūlassa vā hatthapāse. Sace aparikkhittaṃ hoti, yasmiṃ

original: gabbhe cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tasmiṃ gabbhe vatthabbaṃ gabbhassa vā hatthapāse. Udositaaḍḍamāḷapāsādahammiyesupi
analyzed: gabbhe cīvaram nikkhittam tasmin gabbhe vatthabbam gabbhassa vā hattha pāse udosita aḍḍamāḷa pāsāda hammiye supi

analyzed: nivesane vutta nayena iva vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Sace ekakulassa nāvā hoti, antonāvāyaṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā antonāvāyaṃ vatthabbaṃ.

analyzed: hoti tasmin ovarake vatthabbam ovarakassa hattha pāse vā

original: cīvarassa hatthapāse vasitabbaṃ. Sace sattho gacchanto gāmaṃ vā nadiṃ vā pariyādiyitvā

original: satthaparihāro labbhati. Atha gāme vā nadiyā vā pariyāpanno hoti, gāmaparihāro ceva
analyzed: sattha parihāraḥ labbhati atha gāme vā nadiyā vā pariyāpannaḥ hoti gāma parihāraḥ ca iva

analyzed: cīvaram nikkhittam tattha vasitabbam

original: kandakhādanīyaṃ muḷālakhādanīyaṃ matthakakhādanīyaṃ khandhakhādanīyaṃ tacakhādanīyaṃ
analyzed: kanda khādanīyam muḷāla khādanīyam matthaka khādanīyam khandha khādanīyam taca khādanīyam

original: pattakhādanīyaṃ pupphakhādanīyaṃ phalakhādanīyaṃ aṭṭhikhādanīyaṃ piṭṭhakhādanīyaṃ
analyzed: patta khādanīyam puppha khādanīyam phala khādanīyam aṭṭhi khādanīyam piṭṭha khādanīyam

original: niyyāsakhādanīyanti, idampi khādanīyasaṅkhyameva gacchati.
analyzed: niyyāsa khādanīyanti idam api khādanīya saṅkhyam eva gacchati

original: Tattha pana āmisagatikasallakkhaṇatthaṃ idaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ – mūlakhādanīye
analyzed: tattha pana āmisa gatika sat lakkhaṇa attham idam mukha matta nidassanam mūla khādanīye

original: tāva mūlakamūlaṃ khārakamūlaṃ caccumūlaṃ tambakamūlaṃ taṇḍuleyyakamūlaṃ vatthuleyyakamūlaṃ
analyzed: mūlaka mūlam khāraka mūlam caccu mūlam tambaka mūlam taṇḍuleyyaka mūlam vatthuleyyaka mūlam

original: vajakalimūlaṃ jajjharimūlanti evamādīni sūpeyyapaṇṇamūlāni āmisagatikāni. Ettha ca
analyzed: vajakali mūlam evamādīni sūpeyya paṇṇamūlāni āmisa gatikāni ettha ca

original: vajakalimūle jaraṭṭhaṃ chinditvā chaḍḍenti, taṃ yāvajīvikaṃ hoti. Aññampi evarūpaṃ
analyzed: vaja kali mūle jaraṭṭham chinditvā chaḍḍenti tam yāvajīvikam hoti aññam pi evarūpam

original: eteneva nayena veditabbaṃ. Mūlakakhārakajajjharimūlānaṃ pana jaraṭṭhānipi āmisagatikānevāti
analyzed: etena iva nayena veditabbam mūlaka khāraka jajjhari mūlānam pana jaraṭṭhāni pi āmisa gatikān eva ati

original: vuttaṃ. Yāni pana pāḷiyaṃ –
analyzed: vuttam yāni pana pāḷiyam

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, mūlāni bhesajjāni haliddiṃ siṅgiveraṃ vacaṃ vacattaṃ ativisaṃ
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave mūlāni bhesajjāni haliddim siṅgiveram vacam vacattam ativisam

original: kaṭukarohiṇiṃ usīraṃ bhaddamuttakaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjāni
analyzed: kaṭukarohiṇim usīram bhaddamuttakam yāni vā pana aññāni pi atthi mūlāni bhesajjāni

original: neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharantī”ti –
analyzed: na iva khādanīye khādanīya attham pharanti na bhojanīye bhojanīya attham pharanti iti

original: Vuttāni, tāni yāvajīvikāni. Tesaṃ cūḷapañcamūlaṃ mahāpañcamūlantiādinā nayena gaṇiyamānānaṃ
analyzed: vuttāni tāni yāvajīvikāni tesam cūḷapañcamūlam mahāpañcamūla iti ādinā nayena gaṇiyamānānam

original: gaṇanāya anto natthi, khādanīyatthañca bhojanīyatthañca apharaṇabhāvoyeva panetesaṃ
analyzed: gaṇanāya antaḥ natthi khādanīya attham ca bhojanīya attham ca pana itesam

original: lakkhaṇaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ kiñci mūlaṃ tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ
analyzed: lakkhaṇam tasmai yam kiñci mūlam tesu tesu janapadesu pakati āhāra vasena manussānam

original: khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharati, taṃ yāvakālikaṃ, itaraṃ yāvajīvikanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: khādanīya attham bhojanīya attham ca pharati tam yāvakālikam itaram yāvajīvikam ti veditabbam

original: Subahuṃ vatvāpi hi imasmiṃyeva lakkhaṇe ṭhātabbaṃ. Nāmasaññāsu pana vuccamānāsu taṃ
analyzed: su bahum vatvā api hi imasmiṃ yeva lakkhaṇe ṭhātabbam nāma saññāsu pana vuccamānāsu tam

original: taṃ nāmaṃ ajānantānaṃ sammohoyeva hoti, tasmā nāmasaññāya ādaraṃ akatvā lakkhaṇameva
analyzed: tam nāmam a jānantānam hoti tasmai nāma saññāya ādaram a katvā lakkhaṇam eva

original: dassitaṃ. Yathā ca mūle, evaṃ kandādīsupi lakkhaṇaṃ dassayissāma, tasseva vasena
analyzed: dassitam yathā ca mūle evam kanda ādīsu pi lakkhaṇam dassayissāma tassa iva vasena

original: vinicchayo veditabbo. Yañca taṃ pāḷiyaṃ haliddādi aṭṭhavidhaṃ vuttaṃ, tassa khandhatacapupphaphalādi
analyzed: vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ yat ca tam pāḷiyam halidda ādi aṭṭhavidham vuttam tassa khandha taca puppha phala ādi

original: sabbaṃ yāvajīvikanti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sabbam yāvajīvikam ti vuttam

original: Kandakhādanīye duvidho kando dīgho ca bhisakiṃsukakandādi, vaṭṭo ca uppalakaserukakandādi,
analyzed: kanda khādanīye duvidhaḥ kandaḥ dīghaḥ ca bhisa kiṃsuka kanda ādi vaṭṭaḥ ca uppala kaseruka kanda ādi

original: yaṃ gaṇṭhītipi vadanti. Tattha sabbesaṃ kandānaṃ jiṇṇajaraṭṭhaṭṭhānañca challi ca
analyzed: yam vadanti tattha sabbesam kandānam challi ca

original: sukhumamūlāni ca yāvajīvikāni, taruṇo pana sukhakhādanīyo sālakalyāṇipotakakando
analyzed: sukhuma mūlāni ca yāvajīvikāni taruṇaḥ pana sukha khādanīyaḥ sāla kalyāṇi potaka kandaḥ

original: kiṃsukapotakakando ambāṭakakando ketakakando māluvakando bhisasaṅkhāto padumapuṇḍarīkakando
analyzed: kiṃsu kapotaka kandaḥ ambāṭaka kandaḥ ketaka kandaḥ māluva kandaḥ bhisa saṅkhātaḥ paduma puṇḍarīka kando

original: piṇḍālumasāluādayo ca khīravallikando āluvakando siggukando tālakando nīluppalarattuppalakumudasogandhikānaṃ
analyzed: ca khīravallikandaḥ āluvakandaḥ siggukandaḥ tālakandaḥ nīluppala rattuppala kumuda sogandhikānam

original: kandā kadalikando veḷukando kaserukakandoti evamādayo tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena
analyzed: kandā kadali kandaḥ veḷu kandaḥ kaseruka kandaḥ iti evamādayaḥ tesu tesu janapadesu pakati āhāra vasena

original: manussānaṃ khādanīyatthañca bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakakandā yāvakālikā. Khīravallikando
analyzed: manussānam khādanīya ttham ca bhojanīya ttham ca pharaṇaka kandā yāva kālikā khīra valli kandaḥ

original: adhoto yāvajīviko, dhoto yāvakāliko. Khīrakākolijīvikausabhakalasuṇādikandā pana
analyzed: a dhotaḥ yāvajīvikaḥ dhotaḥ yāva kālikaḥ khīra kākoli jīvi kausabha kala suṇa ādi kandā pana

original: yāvajīvikā. Te pāḷiyaṃ “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjānī”ti evaṃ mūlabhesajjasaṅgaheneva saṅgahitā.
analyzed: yāvajīvikā te pāḷiyam yāni vā pana aññāni pi atthi mūlāni bhesajjāni iti evam mūla bhesajja saṅgahena iva saṅgahitā

original: Muḷālakhādanīye padumamuḷālaṃ puṇḍarīkamuḷālaṃ mūlasadisaṃyeva. Erakamuḷālaṃ kandulamuḷālanti
analyzed: muḷāla khādanīye paduma muḷālam puṇḍarīka muḷālam eraka muḷālam kandula muḷālanti

original: evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca
analyzed: evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakati āhāra vasena manussānam khādanīya attham bhojanīya attham ca

original: pharaṇakamuḷālaṃ yāvakālikaṃ, haliddisiṅgiveramakacicaturassavalliketakatālahintālakuntālanāḷikerapūgarukkhādimuḷālaṃ
analyzed: pharaṇaka muḷālam yāvakālikam

original: pana yāvajīvikaṃ. Taṃ sabbampi pāḷiyaṃ “yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūlāni bhesajjānī”ti
analyzed: pana yāvajīvikam tat sabbam pi pāḷiyam yāni vā pana aññāni pi atthi mūlāni bhesajjāni iti

original: evaṃ mūlabhesajjasaṅgaheneva saṅgahitaṃ.
analyzed: evam mūla bhesajja saṅgahena iva saṅgahitam

original: Matthakakhādanīye tālahintālakuntālaketakanāḷikerapūgarukkhakhajjūrivettaerakakadalīnaṃ
analyzed: matthaka khādanīye tāla hintāla kuntāla ketaka nāḷikera pūga rukkha khajjūri vettaeraka kadalīnam

original: kaḷīrasaṅkhātā matthakā, veṇukaḷīro naḷakaḷīro ucchukaḷīro mūlakakaḷīro sāsapakaḷīro
analyzed: kaḷīra saṅkhātāḥ matthakāḥ veṇukaḷīraḥ naḷakaḷīraḥ ucchukaḷīraḥ mūlakakaḷīraḥ sāsapakaḷīraḥ

original: satāvarikaḷīro sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ kaḷīrāti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena
analyzed: satāvari kaḷīro sattannam dhaññānam kaḷīra ati evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakati āhāra vasena

original: manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇako rukkhavalliādīnaṃ matthako yāvakāliko,
analyzed: manussānam khādanīya attham bhojanīya attham ca pharaṇakaḥ rukkha valli ādīnam matthakaḥ yāvakālikaḥ

original: haliddisiṅgiveravacamakacilasuṇānaṃ kaḷīrā, tālahintālakuntālanāḷikerakaḷīrānañca
analyzed: kaḷīrā tāla hintāla kuntāla nāḷikera kaḷīra anañca

original: chinditvā pātito jaraṭṭhabundo yāvajīviko.
analyzed: chinditvā pātitaḥ jaraṭṭhabundaḥ yāvajīvikaḥ

original: Khandhakhādanīye antopathavīgato sālakalyāṇīkhandho ucchukhandho nīluppalarattuppalakumudasogandhikānaṃ
analyzed: khandha khādanīye antar upathavī gataḥ sālakalyāṇī khandhaḥ ucchu khandhaḥ

original: daṇḍakakhandhāti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ
analyzed: daṇḍaka khandhā ti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakati āhāra vasena manussānam khādanīya ttham

original: bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇako khandho yāvakāliko, uppalajātīnaṃ paṇṇadaṇḍako padumajātīnaṃ
analyzed: bhojanīya ttham ca pharaṇakaḥ khandhaḥ yāva kālikaḥ uppala jātīnam paṇṇa daṇḍakaḥ paduma jātīnam

original: sabbopi daṇḍako karavindadaṇḍādayo ca avasesasabbakhandhā yāvajīvikā.
analyzed: sabbaḥ api daṇḍako karavindadaṇḍa ādayo ca avasesa sabba khandhā yāvajīvikā

original: Tacakhādanīye ucchutacova eko yāvakāliko, sopi saraso, seso sabbo yāvajīviko. Tesaṃ pana matthakakhandhatacānaṃ tiṇṇampi pāḷiyaṃ kasāvabhesajjena saṅgaho veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ –
analyzed: taca khādanīye ekaḥ yāvakāliko so api sarasaḥ seso sabbaḥ yāvajīviko tesam pana matthaka khandha tacānam tiṇṇam pi pāḷiyam kasāva bhesajjena saṅgahaḥ veditabbo vuttam ha etam

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kasāvāni bhesajjāni nimbakasāvaṃ kuṭajakasāvaṃ paṭolakasāvaṃ
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave kasāvāni bhesajjāni nimba kasāvam kuṭaja kasāvam paṭolaka sāvam

original: phaggavakasāvaṃ nattamālakasāvaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi kasāvāni bhesajjāni neva
analyzed: phaggava kasāvam nattamāla kasāvam yāni vā pana aññāni pi atthi kasāvāni bhesajjāni na iva

original: khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharantī”ti.
analyzed: khādanīye khādanīya attham pharanti na bhojanīye bhojanīya attham pharanti iti

original: Ettha hi etesampi saṅgaho sijjhati. Vuttakasāvāni ca sabbakappiyānīti veditabbāni.
analyzed: ettha hi etesam pi saṅgahaḥ sijjhati vutta kasāvāni ca sabba kappiyāni iti veditabbāni

original: Pattakhādanīye mūlakaṃ khārako caccu tambako taṇḍuleyyako papunnāgo vatthuleyyako
analyzed: patta khādanīye mūlakam khārako caccu tambako taṇḍuleyyako papunnāgaḥ vatthuleyyako

original: vajakali jajjhari sellu siggu kāsamaddako ummācīnamuggo māso rājamāso ṭhapetvā mahānipphāvaṃ
analyzed: vajakali jajjhari sellu siggu kāsamaddakaḥ ummācīnamuggaḥ māsaḥ rājamāsaḥ ṭhapetvā mahā nipphāvam

original: avasesanipphāvo aggimantho sunisannako setavaraṇo nāḷikā bhūmiyaṃ jātaloṇīti etesaṃ
analyzed: avasesanipphāvaḥ aggimantho sunisannakaḥ setavaraṇaḥ nāḷikā bhūmiyam jātaloṇī iti etesam

original: pattāni, aññāni ca evarūpāni tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthañca
analyzed: pattāni aññāni ca evarūpāni tesu tesu janapadesu pakati āhāra vasena manussānam khādanīya ttham ca

original: bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇakāni pattāni ekaṃsena yāvakālikāni, yā panaññā mahānakhapiṭṭhimattapaṇṇā
analyzed: bhojanīya ttham ca pharaṇakāni pattāni ekaṃsena yāvakālikāni yā panaññā mahā nakha piṭṭhi matta paṇṇā

original: loṇirukkhe ca gacche ca ārohati, tassā pattaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ. Brahmipattañca yāvakālikanti
analyzed: loṇi rukkhe ca gacche ca ārohati tassā pattam yāvajīvikam brahmi pattam ca yāvakālikanti

original: dīpavāsino vadanti. Ambapallavaṃ yāvakālikaṃ, asokapallavaṃ pana yāvajīvikaṃ. Yāni caññāni pāḷiyaṃ –
analyzed: dīpa vāsinaḥ vadanti ambapallavam yāvakālikam asokapallavam pana yāvajīvikam yāni caññāni pāḷiyam

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṇṇāni bhesajjāni nimbapaṇṇaṃ kuṭajapaṇṇaṃ paṭolapaṇṇaṃ sulasipaṇṇaṃ
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave paṇṇāni bhesajjāni nimba paṇṇam kuṭaja paṇṇam paṭola paṇṇam sulasi paṇṇam

original: kappāsapaṇṇaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi paṇṇāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye khādanīyatthaṃ
analyzed: kappāsa paṇṇam yāni vā pana aññāni api atthi paṇṇāni bhesajjāni na iva khādanīye khādanīya attham

original: pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharantī”ti –
analyzed: pharanti na bhojanīye bhojanīya ttham pharanti iti

original: Vuttāni, tāni yāvajīvikāni. Na kevalañca paṇṇāni, tesaṃ pupphaphalānipi. Yāvajīvikapaṇṇānaṃ
analyzed: vuttāni tāni yāvajīvikāni na kevalam ca paṇṇāni tesam puppha phalāni pi yāvajīvika paṇṇānam

original: pana phaggavapaṇṇaṃ ajjukapaṇṇaṃ phaṇijjakapaṇṇaṃ tambūlapaṇṇaṃ paduminipaṇṇanti
analyzed: pana phaggava paṇṇam ajjuka paṇṇam phaṇijjaka paṇṇam tambūla paṇṇam padumini paṇṇanti

original: evaṃ gaṇanavasena anto natthi.
analyzed: evam gaṇana vasena antaḥ natthi

original: Pupphakhādanīye mūlakapupphaṃ khārakapupphaṃ caccupupphaṃ tambakapupphaṃ vajakalipupphaṃ
analyzed: puppha khādanīye mūlaka puppham khāraka puppham caccu puppham tambaka puppham vajakali puppham

original: jajjharipupphaṃ cūḷanipphāvapupphaṃ mahānipphāvapupphaṃ kaserukapupphaṃ nāḷikeratālaketakānaṃ
analyzed: jajjhari puppham cūḷanipphāva puppham mahānipphāva puppham kaseruka puppham nāḷikera tāla ketakānam

original: taruṇapupphāni setavaraṇapupphaṃ siggupupphaṃ uppalapadumajātikānaṃ pupphānaṃ kaṇṇikāmattaṃ
analyzed: taruṇa pupphāni setavaraṇa puppham siggu puppham uppala paduma jātikānam pupphānam kaṇṇikā mattam

original: agandhipupphaṃ karīrapupphaṃ jīvantī pupphanti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena
analyzed: agandhi puppham karīra puppham jīvantī pupphanti evamādi tesu tesu janapadesu pakati āhāra vasena

original: manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ bhojanīyatthañca pharaṇapupphaṃ yāvakālikaṃ, asokabakulakuyyakapunnāgacampakajātikaravīrakaṇikārakundanavamālikamallikādīnaṃ
analyzed: manussānam khādanīya attham bhojanīya attham ca pharaṇa puppham yāvakālikam asoka bakula kuyyaka punnāga campaka jāti karavīra kaṇikāra kunda navamālika mallikā ādīnam

original: pana pupphaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ, tassa gaṇanāya anto natthi. Pāḷiyaṃ panassa kasāvabhesajjena saṅgaho veditabbo.
analyzed: pana puppham yāvajīvikam tassa gaṇanāya antaḥ natthi pāḷiyam pana assa kasāva bhesajjena saṅgahaḥ veditabbo

original: Phalakhādanīye panasalabujatālanāḷikeraambajambuambāṭakatintiṇikamātuluṅgakapitthalābukumbhaṇḍapussaphalatimbarūsakatipusavātiṅgaṇacocamocamadhukādīnaṃ
analyzed: phala khādanīye panasa labuja tāla nāḷikera amba jambu ambāṭaka tintiṇika mātuluṅga kapittha lābu kumbhaṇḍa pussa phala timba rūsaka tipusa vātiṅgaṇa coca moca madhuka ādīnam

original: phalāni, yāni loke tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthaṃ
analyzed: phalāni yāni loke tesu tesu janapadesu pakati āhāra vasena manussānam khādanīya ttham

original: bhojanīyatthañca pharanti, sabbāni tāni yāvakālikāni, nāmagaṇanavasena tesaṃ na sakkā
analyzed: bhojanīya ttham ca pharanti sabbāni tāni yāvakālikāni nāma gaṇana vasena tesam na sakkā

original: pariyantaṃ dassetuṃ. Yāni pana pāḷiyaṃ –
analyzed: pariyantam dassetum yāni pana pāḷiyam

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, phalāni bhesajjāni bilaṅgaṃ pippaliṃ marīcaṃ harītakaṃ vibhītakaṃ
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave phalāni bhesajjāni bilaṅgam pippalim marīcam harītakam vibhītakam

original: āmalakaṃ goṭṭhaphalaṃ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi phalāni bhesajjāni neva khādanīye
analyzed: āmalakam goṭṭha phalam yāni vā panaññāni api atthi phalāni bhesajjāni na iva khādanīye

original: khādanīyatthaṃ pharanti, na bhojanīye bhojanīyatthaṃ pharantī”ti –
analyzed: khādanīya ttham pharanti na bhojanīye bhojanīya ttham pharanti iti

original: Vuttāni, tāni yāvajīvikāni. Tesampi aparipakkāni acchivabimbavaraṇaketakakāsmarīādīnaṃ phalāni jātiphalaṃ kaṭukaphalaṃ eḷā takkolanti evaṃ nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetuṃ.

original: Aṭṭhikhādanīye labujaṭṭhi panasaṭṭhi ambāṭakaṭṭhi sālaṭṭhi khajjūrīketakatimbarūsakānaṃ

original: datvā tassa santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Tatridaṃ vatthu – karavikatissatthero
analyzed: da tvā tassa santakam katvā paribhuñjitabbam tatridam vatthu

original: kira vinayadharapāmokkho mahāsīvattherassa santikaṃ agamāsi. So dīpālokena sappikumbhaṃ
analyzed: kira vinaya dhara pāmokkhaḥ mahāsīva therassa santikam agamāsi saḥ dīpa ālokena sappi kumbham

original: passitvā “bhante, kimeta”nti pucchi. Thero “āvuso, gāmato sappikumbho ābhato lūkhadivase
analyzed: passitvā bhante kim etat ti pucchi theraḥ āvuso gāmataḥ sappi kumbhaḥ ābhataḥ lūkha divase

original: sappinā bhuñjanatthāyā”ti āha. Tato naṃ tissatthero “na vaṭṭati, bhante”ti āha. Thero
analyzed: sappinā bhuñjana tthāya iti āha tatas nam tissa theraḥ na vaṭṭati bhante ti āha theraḥ

original: punadivase pamukhe nikkhipāpesi. Tissatthero puna ekadivasaṃ āgato taṃ disvā tatheva
analyzed: puna divase pamukhe nikkhipāpesi tissa theraḥ puna eka divasam āgataḥ tam disvā tathā iva

original: pucchitvā “bhante, sahaseyyappahonakaṭṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Thero punadivase
analyzed: pucchitvā bhante sahaseyya pahonaka ṭṭhāne ṭhapetum na vaṭṭati iti āha thero puna divase

original: bahi nīharāpetvā nikkhipāpesi, taṃ corā hariṃsu. So puna ekadivasaṃ āgataṃ tissattheramāha
analyzed: bahi nīharāpetvā nikkhipāpesi tam corāḥ hariṃsu saḥ punar eka divasam āgatam tissa theram āha

original: “āvuso, tayā ‘na vaṭṭatī’ti vutte so kumbho bahi nikkhitto corehi haṭo”ti. Tato naṃ
analyzed: āvuso tayā na vaṭṭati iti vutte saḥ kumbhaḥ bahi nikkhitto corehi haṭaḥ tatas nam

original: tissatthero āha “nanu, bhante, anupasampannassa dātabbo assa, anupasampannassa hi
analyzed: tissa theraḥ āha nanu bhante anupasampannassa dātabbaḥ assa anupasampannassa hi

original: datvā tassa santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
analyzed: datvā tassa santakam katvā paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati iti

original: Iti pāḷimuttakavinayavinicchayasaṅgahe
analyzed: iti pāḷimuttaka vinaya vinicchaya saṅgahe

original: Kappiyabhūmivinicchayakathā samattā.
analyzed: kappiyabhūmi vinicchaya kathā samattā

original: 20. Paṭiggahaṇavinicchayakathā
analyzed: paṭiggahaṇa vinicchaya kathā

original: 104. Khādanīyādipaṭiggāhoti ajjhoharitabbassa yassa kassaci khādanīyassa vā bhojanīyassa
analyzed: khādanīya ādi paṭiggāhaḥ ti ajjhoharitabbassa yassa kassaci khādanīyassa vā bhojanīyassa

original: vā paṭiggahaṇaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – pañcahi aṅgehi paṭiggahaṇaṃ ruhati, thāmamajjhimassa

original: purisassa uccāraṇamattaṃ hoti, hatthapāso paññāyati, abhihāro paññāyati, devo vā

original: manusso vā tiracchānagato vā kāyena kāyapaṭibaddhena nissaggiyena vā deti, tañce

analyzed: bhikkhu kāyena vā kāya paṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhāti evam pañca haṅgehi paṭiggahaṇam ruhati

original: Tattha ṭhitanisinnanipannānaṃ vasena evaṃ hatthapāso veditabbo – sace bhikkhu nisinno
analyzed: tattha ṭhita nisinna nipannānam vasena evam hattha pāsaḥ veditabbaḥ sace bhikkhu nisinnaḥ

original: yena passena nipanno, tassa pārimantato paṭṭhāya, dāyakassa nisinnassa vā ṭhitassa
analyzed: yena passena nipanno tassa pārimantataḥ paṭṭhāya dāyakassa nisinnassa vā ṭhitassa

original: paricchinditvā aḍḍhateyyahattho hatthapāso nāma.
analyzed: paricchinditvā aḍḍhateyya hatthaḥ hatthapāsaḥ nāma

original: Sace pana dāyakapaṭiggāhakesu eko ākāse hoti, eko bhūmiyaṃ, bhūmaṭṭhassa ca sīsena,

original: ākāsaṭṭhassa ca ṭhapetvā dātuṃ vā gahetuṃ vā pasāritahatthaṃ yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ,
analyzed: ākāsa aṭṭhassa ca ṭhapetvā dātum vā gahetum vā pasārita hattham yam āsannataram aṅgam

original: tassa orimantena hatthapāsapamāṇaṃ paricchinditabbaṃ. Sacepi eko kūpe hoti, eko kūpataṭe,
analyzed: tassa orimantena hattha pāsa pamāṇam paricchinditabbam sace pi ekaḥ kūpe hoti ekaḥ kūpa taṭe

analyzed: ekaḥ vā pana rukkhe ekaḥ pathaviyam vutta nayena iva hattha pāsa pamāṇam paricchinditabbam

original: Evarūpe hatthapāse ṭhatvā sacepi pakkhī mukhatuṇḍakena vā hatthī vā soṇḍāya gahetvā

analyzed: puppham vā phalam vā deti paṭiggahaṇam ruhati sace pana aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanassa api

original: hatthino khandhe nisinno tena soṇḍāya dīyamānaṃ gaṇhāti, vaṭṭatiyeva. Hatthādīsu
analyzed: hatthino khandhe nisinnaḥ tena soṇḍāya dīyamānam gaṇhāti vaṭṭatiyā iva hattha ādīsu

original: yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena antamaso pādaṅguliyāpi dīyamānaṃ kāyena dinnaṃ nāma hoti.
analyzed: yena kenacid sarīra avayavena dīyamānam kāyena dinnam nāma hoti

original: Paṭiggahaṇepi eseva nayo. Yena kenaci hi sarīrāvayavena gahitaṃ kāyena gahitameva
analyzed: paṭiggahaṇe pi eṣa iva nayaḥ yena kenacid hi sarīra avayavena gahitam kāyena gahitam eva

analyzed: hoti sace pi natthukaraṇiyam dīyamānam nāsāpuṭena a kallakaḥ vā mukhena paṭiggaṇhāti

original: ābhogameva hettha pamāṇaṃ.
analyzed: ābhogam eva ha itthā pamāṇam

analyzed: pana yena kenacid upakaraṇena dinnam kāya paṭibaddhena dinnam nāma

original: hoti. Paṭiggahaṇepi eseva nayo. Yena kenaci hi sarīrasambaddhena pattathālakādinā
analyzed: hoti paṭiggahaṇe pi esa iva nayaḥ yena kenaci hi sarīra sambaddhena patta thālaka ādinā

original: gahitaṃ kāyapaṭibaddhena gahitameva hoti. Kāyato pana kāyapaṭibaddhato ca mocetvā

original: hatthapāse ṭhitassa kāye vā kāyapaṭibaddhe vā pātiyamānampi nissaggiyena payogena
analyzed: hattha pāse ṭhitassa kāye vā kāya paṭibaddhe vā pātiyamānam pi nissaggiyena payogena

original: dinnaṃ nāma hoti. Eko bahūni bhattabyañjanabhājanāni sīse katvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ
analyzed: dinnam nāma hoti ekaḥ bahūni bhatta byañjana bhājanāni sīse katvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ

original: āgantvā ṭhitakova “gaṇhathā”ti vadati, na tāva abhihāro paññāyati, tasmā na gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: āgantvā ṭhitakaḥ uva gaṇhatha ati vadati na tāva abhihāro paññāyati tasmā na gahetabbam

original: Sace pana īsakampi onamati, bhikkhunā hatthaṃ pasāretvā heṭṭhimabhājanaṃ ekadesenapi
analyzed: sace pana īsakam pi onamati bhikkhunā hattham pasāretvā heṭṭhima bhājanam eka desena api

original: sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Ettāvatā sabbabhājanāni paṭiggahitāni honti. Tato paṭṭhāya oropetvā
analyzed: sampaṭicchitabbam ettāvatā sabba bhājanāni paṭiggahitāni honti tatas paṭṭhāya oropetvā

analyzed: ugghāṭetvā vā yam icchati tam gahetum vaṭṭati bhatta pacchi ādimhi pana eka bhājane

original: vattabbameva natthi.
analyzed: vattabbam eva natthi

original: Kājena bhattaṃ harantopi sace kājaṃ onametvā deti, vaṭṭati. Tiṃsahattho veṇu hoti,
analyzed: kājena bhattam harantaḥ api sace kājam onametvā deti vaṭṭati tiṃsa hatthaḥ veṇu hoti

analyzed: ekasmin ante guḷa kumbhaḥ baddhaḥ ekasmin sappi kumbhaḥ tat ce paṭiggaṇhāti sabbam paṭiggahitam eva

analyzed: paggharantam eva rasam gaṇhatha ati vadati abhihāraḥ na paññāyati iti

analyzed: na gahetabbaḥ sace pana kasaṭam chaḍḍetvā hatthena ussiñcitvā deti vaṭṭati bahū

original: pattā mañce vā pīṭhe vā kaṭasāre vā doṇiyaṃ vā phalake vā ṭhapitā honti, yattha ṭhitassa

analyzed: ṭhitena vā nisinnena vā nipannena vā yam tesu pattesu dīyati tat sabbam paṭiggahitam

analyzed: hoti sace pi paṭiggahessāmi iti mañca ādīni abhiruhitvā nisīdati vaṭṭatiyā iva

original: Pathaviyaṃ pana sacepi kucchiyā kucchiṃ āhacca ṭhitā honti, yaṃ yaṃ aṅguliyā vā sūciyā
analyzed: pathaviyam pana sace pi kucchiyā kucchim āhacca ṭhitāḥ honti yam yam aṅguliyā vā sūciyā

original: evaṃ khāṇuke bandhitvā ṭhapitamañcādimhi asaṃhārime phalake vā pāsāṇe vā na ruhatiyeva.
analyzed: evam khāṇuke bandhitvā ṭhapita mañca ādimhi a saṃhārime phalake vā pāsāṇe vā na

original: Tepi hi tatthajātakasaṅkhyupagā honti. Bhūmiyaṃ atthatesu sukhumesu tintiṇikādipaṇṇesu

original: paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhati. Na hi tāni sandhāretuṃ samatthānīti. Mahantesu pana paduminipaṇṇādīsu

analyzed: vattabbaḥ vacanam a sutvā vā an ādiyitvā vā patte ākiratiyā iva puna paṭiggahetabbam

original: Dūre ṭhatvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ khipantepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: dūre bhatta piṇḍam khipante pi esā iva nayo

original: 106. Sace pattathavikato nīhariyamāne patte rajanacuṇṇāni honti, sati udake dhovitabbo,
analyzed: sace patta thavikataḥ nīhariyamāne patte rajana cuṇṇāni honti sati udake dhovitabbo

analyzed: patte rajam patati paṭiggahetvā bhikkhā gaṇhitabbā a paṭiggahetvā gaṇhataḥ vinaya dukkaṭam

original: vacanaṃ asutvā vā anādiyitvā vā bhikkhaṃ dentiyeva, vinayadukkaṭaṃ natthi, puna paṭiggahetvā
analyzed: vacanam a sutvā vā an ādiyitvā vā bhikkham dentiyā iva vinaya dukkaṭam natthi puna paṭiggahetvā

original: aññā bhikkhā gahetabbā. Sace mahāvāto tato tato rajaṃ pāteti, na sakkā hoti bhikkhaṃ
analyzed: aññā bhikkhā gahetabbā sace mahā vāto tatas tatas rajam pāteti na sakkā hoti bhikkham

original: gahetuṃ, “anupasampannassa dassāmī”ti suddhacittena ābhogaṃ katvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: gahetum anupasampannassa dassāmi iti suddha cittena ābhogam katvā gaṇhitum vaṭṭati

original: Evaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā vihāraṃ vā āsanasālaṃ vā gantvā taṃ anupasampannassa datvā puna
analyzed: evam piṇḍāya caritvā vihāram vā āsana sālam vā gantvā tam an upasampannassa da tvā punar

analyzed: tena dinnam vā tassa vissāsena vā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjitum vaṭṭati sace bhikkhācāre

original: sarajaṃ pattaṃ bhikkhussa deti, so vattabbo “imaṃ paṭiggahetvā bhikkhaṃ vā gaṇheyyāsi
analyzed: sarajam pattam bhikkhussa deti saḥ vattabbaḥ imam paṭiggahetvā bhikkham vā gaṇheyyāsi

original: paribhuñjeyyāsi vā”ti, tena tathā kātabbaṃ. Sace rajaṃ upari uppilavati, kañjikaṃ
analyzed: paribhuñjeyyāsi vāti tena tathā kātabbam sace rajam upari uppila vati kañjikam

analyzed: pavāhetvā sesam bhuñjitabbam sace anta upaviṭṭham hoti paṭiggahetabbam an upasampanne

original: asati hatthato amocenteneva yattha anupasampanno atthi, tattha netvā paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: asati hatthataḥ a mocentena iva yattha an upasampannaḥ atthi tattha netvā paṭiggahetabbam

original: Sukkhabhatte patitarajaṃ apanetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace atisukhumaṃ hoti, upari
analyzed: sukkha bhatte patita rajam apanetvā bhuñjitum vaṭṭati sace ati sukhumam hoti upari

analyzed: bhattena saddhim apanetabbam paṭiggahetvā vā bhuñjitabbam yāgum vā sūpam vā puratas

original: ṭhapetvā āluḷentānaṃ bhājanato phusitāni uggantvā patte patanti, patto paṭiggahetabbo.
analyzed: ṭhapetvā āluḷentānam bhājanato phusitāni uggantvā patte patanti pattaḥ paṭiggahetabbo

original: 107. Uḷuṅkena āharitvā dentānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ uḷuṅkato thevā patte patanti, supatitā,
analyzed: uḷuṅkena āharitvā paṭhamataram uḷuṅkataḥ patte patanti su patitā

original: abhihaṭattā doso natthi. Sacepi carukena bhatte ākiriyamāne carukato masi vā chārikā
analyzed: abhihaṭa ttā doso natthi sace pi carukena bhatte ākiriyamāne carukataḥ masi vā chārikā

original: vā patati, abhihaṭattā nevatthi doso. Anantarassa bhikkhuno dīyamānaṃ pattato uppatitvā
analyzed: vā patati abhihaṭa ttā na iva atthi dosaḥ anantarassa bhikkhuno dīyamānam pattataḥ uppatitvā

original: itarassa patte patati, supatitaṃ. Paṭiggahitameva hi taṃ hoti. Sace jajjharisākhādiṃ
analyzed: itarassa patte patati su patitam paṭiggahitam eva hi tam hoti sace

original: phāletvā ekassa bhikkhuno dentānaṃ sākhato phusitāni aññassa patte patanti, patto

original: Kakudhasobbhādayo honti rukkhato patitehi pupphehi sañchannodakā. Sace puppharaso
analyzed: kakudha sobbha ādayaḥ honti rukkhataḥ patitehi pupphehi sañchanna udakā sace puppha rasaḥ

original: na paññāyati, paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Parittaṃ udakaṃ hoti, raso paññāyati, paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: na paññāyati paṭiggahaṇa kiccam natthi parittam udakam hoti rasaḥ paññāyati paṭiggahetabbam

original: Pabbatakandarādīsu kāḷavaṇṇapaṇṇacchannaudakepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: pabbata kandara ādīsu kāḷa vaṇṇa paṇṇa channa audake pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: Pānīyaghaṭe sareṇukāni vā savaṇṭakhīrāni vā pupphāni pakkhittāni honti, paṭiggahetabbaṃ,
analyzed: pānīya ghaṭe sa reṇukāni vā sa vaṇṭa khīrāni vā pupphāni pakkhittāni honti paṭiggahetabbam

original: pupphāni vā paṭiggahetvā pakkhipitabbāni. Pāṭalimallikā pakkhittā honti, vāsamattaṃ
analyzed: pupphāni vā paṭiggahetvā pakkhipitabbāni pāṭali mallikā pakkhittāḥ honti vāsa mattam

original: tiṭṭhati, taṃ abbohārikaṃ. Dubhiyadivasepi āmisena saddhiṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhunā ṭhapitapupphavāsitakapānīyato
analyzed: tiṭṭhati tam abbohārikam dubhiya divase pi āmisena saddhim vaṭṭati bhikkhunā ṭhapita puppha vāsitaka pānīyato

original: sāmaṇero pānīyaṃ gahetvā pītāvasesakaṃ tattheva ākirati, paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Padumasarādīsu
analyzed: sāmaṇeraḥ pānīyam gahetvā pīta avasesakam tattha eva ākirati paṭiggahetabbam paduma sara ādīsu

original: udakaṃ santharitvā ṭhitaṃ pupphareṇuṃ ghaṭena vikkhambhetvā udakaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: udakam santharitvā ṭhitam puppha reṇum ghaṭena vikkhambhetvā udakam gahetum vaṭṭati

original: Kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ hoti, sace tassa rasaṃ pivitukāmo,
analyzed: kappiyam kārāpetvā paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitam dantakaṭṭham hoti sace tassa rasam pivitu kāmo

original: mūlapaṭiggahaṇameva vaṭṭati, appaṭiggahetvā ṭhapitaṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ. Ajānantassa
analyzed: mūla paṭiggahaṇam eva vaṭṭati a paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitam paṭiggahetabbam a jānantassa

original: rase paviṭṭhepi āpattiyeva. Acittakañhi idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ.
analyzed: rase paviṭṭhe pi āpattiyā iva acittakam hi idam sikkhāpadam

original: 115. Mahābhūtesu kiṃ vaṭṭati, kiṃ na vaṭṭatīti? Khīraṃ tāva vaṭṭati, kappiyamaṃsakhīraṃ
analyzed: mahābhūtesu kim vaṭṭati kim na vaṭṭati iti khīram tāva vaṭṭati kappiya maṃsa khīram

original: vā hotu akappiyamaṃsakhīraṃ vā, pivantassa anāpatti. Assu kheḷo siṅghāṇikā muttaṃ
analyzed: vā hotu a kappiya maṃsa khīram vā pivantassa anāpatti assu kheḷaḥ siṅghāṇikā muttam

original: karīsaṃ semhaṃ dantamalaṃ akkhigūthako kaṇṇagūthako sarīre uṭṭhitaloṇanti idaṃ sabbaṃ
analyzed: karīsam semham danta malam akkhi gūthako kaṇṇa gūthako sarīre uṭṭhita loṇam ti idam sabbam

original: vaṭṭati. Yaṃ panettha ṭhānato cavitvā patte vā hatthe vā patati, taṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ,
analyzed: vaṭṭati yam pana ittha ṭhānataḥ cavitvā patte vā hatthe vā patati tam paṭiggahetabbam

original: aṅgalaggaṃ paṭiggahitakameva. Uṇhapāyāsaṃ bhuñjantassa sedo aṅgulianusārena ekābaddhova
analyzed: aṅga laggam paṭiggahitakam eva uṇha pāyāsam bhuñjantassa sedaḥ aṅguli anusārena eka ābaddhaḥ uva

original: hutvā pāyāse santiṭṭhati, piṇḍāya vā carantassa hatthato pattassa mukhavaṭṭito vā
analyzed: hutvā pāyāse santiṭṭhati piṇḍāya vā carantassa hatthataḥ pattassa mukha vaṭṭitaḥ vā

original: pattatalaṃ orohati, ettha paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi, jhāmamahābhūte idaṃ nāma na vaṭṭatīti
analyzed: patta talam orohati ettha paṭiggahaṇa kiccam natthi jhāma mahābhūte idam nāma na vaṭṭati iti

original: natthi, dujjhāpitaṃ pana na vaṭṭati. Sujjhāpitaṃ pana manussaṭṭhimpi cuṇṇaṃ katvā
analyzed: natthi dujjhāpitam pana na vaṭṭati sujjhāpitam pana cuṇṇam katvā

original: lehe upanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Cattāri mahāvikaṭāni asati kappiyakārake sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ
analyzed: lehe upanetum vaṭṭati cattāri mahā vikaṭāni asati kappiya kārake sāmam gahetvā paribhuñjitum

original: vaṭṭanti. Ettha ca dubbacopi asamatthopi kappiyakārako asantapakkheyeva tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: vaṭṭanti ettha ca dubbacaḥ api asamatthaḥ api kappiya kārakaḥ tiṭṭhati

original: Chārikāya asati sukkhadāruṃ jhāpetvā chārikā gahetabbā. Sukkhadārumhi asati alladāruṃ
analyzed: chārikāya asati sukkhadārum jhāpetvā chārikā gahetabbā sukkhadārumhi asati alladārum

original: rukkhato chinditvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Idaṃ pana catubbidhampi mahāvikaṭaṃ kālodissaṃ
analyzed: rukkhataḥ chinditvā api kātum vaṭṭati idam pana catubbidham pi mahā vikaṭam kāla udissam

original: nāma, sappadaṭṭhakkhaṇeyeva vaṭṭati.
analyzed: nāma vaṭṭati

original: Iti pāḷimuttakavinayavinicchayasaṅgahe
analyzed: iti pāḷimuttaka vinaya vinicchaya saṅgahe

original: Paṭiggahaṇavinicchayakathā samattā.
analyzed: paṭiggahaṇa vinicchaya kathā samattā

original: 21. Pavāraṇāvinicchayakathā
116. Paṭikkhepapavāraṇāti pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhuñjamānena yassa kassaci
analyzed: paṭikkhepa pavāraṇā ti pañcannam bhojanānam aññataram bhuñjamānena yassa kassaci

original: abhihaṭabhojanassa paṭikkhepasaṅkhātā pavāraṇā. Sā ca na kevalaṃ paṭikkhepamattena
analyzed: abhihaṭa bhojanassa paṭikkhepa saṅkhātā pavāraṇā sā ca na kevalam paṭikkhepa mattena

original: hoti, atha kho pañcaṅgavasena. Tatrimāni pañcaṅgāni – asanaṃ, bhojanaṃ, dāyakassa
analyzed: hoti atha kho pañcaṅga vasena tatrimāni pañcaṅgāni asanam bhojanam dāyakassa

original: hatthapāse ṭhānaṃ, abhihāro, abhihaṭassa paṭikkhepoti. Tattha asananti vippakatabhojanaṃ,
analyzed: hattha pāse ṭhānam abhihāraḥ abhihaṭassa paṭikkhepaḥ ti tattha asanam ti vippakata bhojanam

original: bhuñjamāno cesa puggalo hotīti attho. Bhojananti pavāraṇappahonakaṃ bhojanaṃ, odanādīnañca
analyzed: bhuñjamānaḥ ca isa puggalaḥ hoti iti atthaḥ bhojananti pavāraṇa pahonakam bhojanam odana ādīnam ca

original: aññataraṃ paṭikkhipitabbaṃ bhojanaṃ hotīti attho. Dāyakassa hatthapāse ṭhānanti pavāraṇappahonakaṃ
analyzed: aññataram paṭikkhipitabbam bhojanam hoti iti attho dāyakassa hattha pāse ṭhānan ti pavāraṇa ppahonakam

original: bhojanaṃ gaṇhitvā dāyakassa aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇe okāse avaṭṭhānaṃ. Abhihāroti
analyzed: bhojanam gaṇhitvā dāyakassa aḍḍhateyya hattha ppamāṇe okāse avaṭṭhānam

original: hatthapāse ṭhitassa dāyakassa kāyena abhihāro. Abhihaṭassa paṭikkhepoti evaṃ abhihaṭassa
analyzed: hattha pāse ṭhitassa dāyakassa kāyena abhihāraḥ abhihaṭassa paṭikkhepaḥ ti evam abhihaṭassa

original: kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhepo. Iti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena pavāraṇā hoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
analyzed: kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhepaḥ iti imesam pañcannam aṅgānam vasena pavāraṇā hoti vuttam pi ca itam

original: “Pañcahi, upāli, ākārehi pavāraṇā paññāyati, asanaṃ paññāyati, bhojanaṃ paññāyati, hatthapāse ṭhito, abhiharati, paṭikkhepo paññāyatī”ti.
analyzed: pañcahi upāli ākārehi pavāraṇā paññāyati asanam paññāyati bhojanam paññāyati hattha pāse ṭhitaḥ abhiharati paṭikkhepaḥ paññāyati iti

original: 117. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – “asana”ntiādīsu tāva yaṃ asnāti, yañca bhojanaṃ hatthapāse
analyzed: tatra ayam vinicchayaḥ

original: ṭhitena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipati, taṃ odano kummāso sattu maccho maṃsanti imesaṃ aññatarameva
analyzed: ṭhitena abhihaṭam paṭikkhipati tam odanaḥ kummāsaḥ sattu macchaḥ maṃsanti imesam aññataram eva

original: veditabbaṃ. Tattha odano nāma sāli vīhi yavo godhumo kaṅgu varako kudrūsakoti sattannaṃ
analyzed: veditabbam tattha odanaḥ nāma sāli vīhi yavaḥ godhumaḥ kaṅgu varako kudrūsaka iti

original: dhaññānaṃ taṇḍulehi nibbatto. Tatra sālīti antamaso nīvāraṃ upādāya sabbāpi sālijāti.
analyzed: dhaññānam taṇḍulehi nibbattaḥ tatra sālī iti antamasas nīvāram upādāya sabbā api sāli jāti

original: Vīhīti sabbāpi vīhijāti. Yavagodhumesu bhedo natthi. Kaṅgūti setarattakāḷabhedā sabbāpi
analyzed: vīhī iti sabbā api vīhi jāti yava godhumesu bhedaḥ natthi kaṅgu uti seta ratta kāḷa bhedā sabbā api

original: kaṅgujāti. Varakoti antamaso varakacorakaṃ upādāya sabbāpi setavaṇṇā varakajāti.
analyzed: kaṅgu jāti varako ti antamasaḥ varaka corakam upādāya sabbā api seta vaṇṇā varaka jāti

original: Kudrūsakoti kāḷakudrūsako ceva sāmākādibhedā ca sabbāpi tiṇadhaññajāti. Nīvāravarakacorakā
analyzed: kudrūsakā iti kāḷa kudrūsakā ca iva sāmāka ādi bhedā ca sabbā api tiṇa dhañña jāti nīvāra varaka corakā

original: cettha dhaññānulomāti vadanti, dhaññāni hontu dhaññānulomāni vā, etesaṃ vuttappabhedānaṃ
analyzed: ca ittha dhaññānulomā iti vadanti dhaññāni hontu dhañña anulomāni vā etesam vutta ppabhedānam

original: sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ taṇḍule gahetvā “bhattaṃ pacissāmā”ti vā “yāguṃ pacissāmā”ti
analyzed: sattannam dhaññānam taṇḍule gahetvā bhattam pacissāma ati vā yāgum pacissāma ati

original: vā “ambilapāyāsādīsu aññataraṃ pacissāmā”ti vā yaṃ kiñci sandhāya pacantu, sace uṇhaṃ
analyzed: vā ambila pāyāsa ādīsu aññataram pacissāma ati vā yam kiñci sandhāya pacantu sace uṇham

original: sītalaṃ vā bhuñjantānaṃ bhojanakāle gahitagahitaṭṭhāne odhi paññāyati, odanasaṅgahameva
analyzed: sītalam vā bhuñjantānam bhojana kāle gahita gahita ṭṭhāne odhi paññāyati odana saṅgaham eva

original: gacchati, pavāraṇaṃ janeti. Sace odhi na paññāyati, yāgusaṅgahaṃ gacchati, pavāraṇaṃ na janeti.
analyzed: gacchati pavāraṇam janeti sace odhi na paññāyati yāgu saṅgaham gacchati pavāraṇam na janeti

original: Yopi pāyāso vā paṇṇaphalakaḷīramissakā ambilayāgu vā uddhanato otāritamattā abbhuṇhā
analyzed: yo pi pāyāsaḥ vā paṇṇa phala kaḷīra missakāḥ ambila yāgu vā uddhanataḥ otārita mattā abbhuṇhā

original: hoti āvajjitvā pivituṃ sakkā, hatthena gahitokāsepi odhiṃ na dasseti, pavāraṇaṃ na
analyzed: hoti āvajjitvā pivitum sakkā hatthena gahita ukāse pi odhim na dasseti pavāraṇam na

original: janeti. Sace pana usumāya vigatāya sītalabhūtā ghanabhāvaṃ gacchati, odhiṃ dasseti,
analyzed: jana iti sace pana usumāya vigatāya sītala bhūtā ghana bhāvam gacchati odhim dassa iti

original: puna pavāraṇaṃ janeti, pubbe tanubhāvo na rakkhati. Sacepi dadhitakkādīni āropetvā
analyzed: puna pavāraṇam janeti pubbe tanu bhāvaḥ na rakkhati sace pi dadhi takka ādīni āropetvā

original: bahū paṇṇaphalakaḷīre pakkhipitvā muṭṭhimattāpi taṇḍulā pakkhittā honti, bhojanakāle
analyzed: bahū paṇṇa phala kaḷīre pakkhipitvā muṭṭhimattā api taṇḍulā pakkhittāḥ honti bhojana kāle

original: ce odhi paññāyati, pavāraṇaṃ janeti. Ayāguke nimantane “yāguṃ dassāmā”ti bhatte udakakañjikakhīrādīni
analyzed: ce odhi paññāyati pavāraṇam janeti a yāguke nimantane yāgum dassāma ati bhatte udaka kañjika khīra ādīni

original: ākiritvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti denti. Kiñcāpi tanuko hoti, pavāraṇaṃ janetiyeva. Sace
analyzed: ākiritvā yāgum gaṇhatha ati denti kiñca api tanukaḥ pavāraṇam sace

original: pana pakkuthitesu udakādīsu pakkhipitvā pacitvā denti, yāgusaṅgahameva gacchati.
analyzed: pana pakkuthitesu udaka ādīsu pakkhipitvā pacitvā denti yāgu saṅgaham eva gacchati

original: Yāgusaṅgahaṃ gatepi tasmiṃ vā aññasmiṃ vā yattha macchamaṃsaṃ pakkhipanti, sace sāsapamattampi
analyzed: yāgu saṅgaham gate pi tasmin vā aññasmin vā yattha maccha maṃsam pakkhipanti sace sāsapa mattam pi

original: macchamaṃsakhaṇḍaṃ vā nhāru vā paññāyati, pavāraṇaṃ janeti, suddharasako pana rasakayāgu
analyzed: maccha maṃsa khaṇḍam vā nhāru vā paññāyati pavāraṇam janeti suddha rasakaḥ pana rasaka yāgu

original: vā na janeti. Ṭhapetvā vuttadhaññataṇḍule aññehi veṇutaṇḍulādīhi vā kaṇḍamūlaphalehi
analyzed: vā na janeti ṭhapetvā vutta dhañña taṇḍule aññehi veṇu taṇḍula ādīhi vā kaṇḍa mūla phalehi

original: vā yehi kehici kataṃ bhattampi pavāraṇaṃ na janeti, pageva ghanayāgu. Sace panettha
analyzed: vā yehi kehici katam bhattam pi pavāraṇam na janeti pagā iva ghana yāgu sace panā ittha

original: macchamaṃsaṃ pakkhipanti, janeti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ “pupphiatthāya bhattampi pavāraṇaṃ
analyzed: maccha maṃsam pakkhipanti janeti mahā paccariyam pupphi atthāya bhattam pi pavāraṇam

original: janetī”ti vuttaṃ. Pupphiatthāya bhattaṃ nāma pupphikhajjakatthāya kuthitudake pakkhipitvā
analyzed: janeti iti vuttam pupphi atthāya bhattam nāma pupphi khajjaka atthāya kuthita udake pakkhipitvā

original: seditataṇḍulā vuccanti. Sace pana te taṇḍule sukkhāpetvā khādanti, vaṭṭati, neva
analyzed: sedita taṇḍulāḥ vuccanti sace pana te taṇḍule sukkhāpetvā khādanti vaṭṭati na eva

original: sattusaṅkhyaṃ, na bhattasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. Puna tehi katabhattaṃ pavāretiyeva. Te
analyzed: sattu saṅkhyam na bhatta saṅkhyam gacchanti puna tehi kata bhattam te

original: taṇḍule sappitelādīsu vā pacanti, pūvaṃ vā karonti, na pavārenti. Puthukā vā tāhi
analyzed: taṇḍule sappi tela ādīsu vā pacanti pūvam vā karonti na pavārenti puthukāḥ vā

original: katasattubhattādīni vā na pavārenti.
analyzed: kata sattu bhatta ādīni vā na pavārenti

original: Kummāso nāma yavehi katakummāso. Aññehi pana muggādīhi katakummāso pavāraṇaṃ na janeti.
analyzed: kummāsaḥ nāma yavehi kata kummāsaḥ aññehi pana mugga ādīhi kata kummāsaḥ pavāraṇam na janeti

original: Sattu nāma sālivīhiyavehi katasattu. Kaṅguvarakakudrūsakasīsānipi bhajjitvā īsakaṃ
analyzed: sattu nāma sāli vīhi yavehi kata sattu kaṅgu varaka kudrūsaka sīsa anipi bhajjitvā īsakam

original: koṭṭetvā thuse palāpetvā puna daḷhaṃ koṭṭetvā cuṇṇaṃ karonti. Sacepi taṃ allattā
analyzed: koṭṭetvā thuse palāpetvā punar daḷham koṭṭetvā cuṇṇam karonti sace pi tam

original: ekabaddhaṃ hoti, sattusaṅgahameva gacchati. Kharapākabhajjitānaṃ vīhīnaṃ taṇḍule
analyzed: eka baddham hoti sattu saṅgaham eva gacchati khara pāka bhajjitānam vīhīnam taṇḍule

original: koṭṭetvā denti, tampi cuṇṇaṃ sattusaṅgahameva gacchati. Samapākabhajjitānaṃ pana
analyzed: koṭṭetvā denti tat pi cuṇṇam sattu saṅgaham eva gacchati sama pāka bhajjitānam pana

original: vīhīnaṃ vā vīhipalāsānaṃ vā taṇḍulā bhajjitataṇḍulā eva vā na pavārenti. Tesaṃ pana
analyzed: vīhīnam vā vīhi palāsānam vā taṇḍulāḥ bhajjita taṇḍulāḥ eva vā na pavārenti tesam pana

original: taṇḍulānaṃ cuṇṇaṃ pavāreti, kharapākabhajjitānaṃ vīhīnaṃ kuṇḍakampi pavāreti. Samapākabhajjitānaṃ
analyzed: taṇḍulānam cuṇṇam pavāreti khara pāka bhajjitānam vīhīnam kuṇḍakam pi pavāreti sama pāka bhajjitānam

original: pana ātapasukkhānaṃ vā kuṇḍakaṃ na pavāreti. Lājā vā tehi katabhattasattuādīni vā
analyzed: pana ātapa sukkhānam vā kuṇḍakam na pavāreti lājāḥ vā tehi kata bhatta sattu ādīni vā

original: na pavārenti, bhajjitapiṭṭhaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci suddhakhajjakaṃ vā na pavāreti. Macchamaṃsapūritakhajjakaṃ
analyzed: na pavārenti bhajjita piṭṭham vā yam kiñci suddha khajjakam vā na pavāreti maccha maṃsa pūrita khajjakam

original: pana sattumodako vā pavāreti. Maccho maṃsañca pākaṭameva.
analyzed: pana sattu modakaḥ vā macchaḥ maṃsam ca pākaṭam eva

original: Ayaṃ pana viseso – sace yāguṃ pivantassa yāgusitthamattāneva dve macchakhaṇḍāni vā
analyzed: ayam pana visesaḥ sace yāgum pivantassa dve maccha khaṇḍāni vā

original: maṃsakhaṇḍāni vā ekabhājane vā nānābhājane vā denti, tāni ce akhādanto aññaṃ yaṃ
analyzed: maṃsa khaṇḍāni vā eka bhājane vā nānā bhājane vā denti tāni ce a khādantaḥ aññam yam

original: kiñci pavāraṇappahonakaṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti. Tato ekaṃ khāditaṃ, ekaṃ hatthe
analyzed: kiñci pavāraṇa pahonakam paṭikkhipati na pavāreti tatas ekam khāditam ekam hatthe

original: vā patte vā hoti, so ce aññaṃ paṭikkhipati, pavāreti. Dvepi khāditāni honti, mukhe
analyzed: vā patte vā hoti so ce aññam paṭikkhipati pavāreti dve pi khāditāni honti mukhe

original: sāsapamattampi avasiṭṭhaṃ natthi, sacepi aññaṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti. Kappiyamaṃsaṃ

analyzed: heṭṭhima kāyo paripuṇṇaḥ ubhaya vāmanassa ubho pi kāyāḥ rassāḥ honti yesam rassattā bhūtānam

analyzed: galagaṇḍī iti yassa kumbhaṇḍam viya gale gaṇḍaḥ hoti desanā mattam eva yasmin

analyzed: kismiñci pana padese gaṇḍe sati na pabbājetabbaḥ tattha vinicchayaḥ na bhikkhave

original: pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭho pabbājetabbo”ti ettha vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Lakkhaṇāhatakasāhatalikhitakesu

analyzed: yat vattabbam tat heṭṭhā vuttam eva sīpadī iti bhāra pādaḥ vuccati yassa pādaḥ thūlaḥ

analyzed: hoti sañjāta pīḷakaḥ kharo saḥ na pabbājetabbaḥ yassa pana na tāva khara bhāvam gaṇhāti

analyzed: vā pacchim sīse katvā ṭhitaḥ viya ati khuddaka sīsaḥ vā sarīrassa ananurūpena ati khuddakena

analyzed: viya nalāṭena samannāgato

original: vā pādassa bāhirantena caṅkamanakhañjo vā pādassa abbhantarena caṅkamanakhañjo vā
analyzed: vā pādassa bāhirantena caṅkamana khañjaḥ vā pādassa abbhantarena caṅkamana khañjaḥ vā

original: Bhikkhunīnaṃ pana sīmaṃ ajjhottharitvā antopi bhikkhūnaṃ sīmaṃ sammannituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: bhikkhunīnam pana sīmam ajjhottharitvā antar pi bhikkhūnam sīmam sammannitum vaṭṭati

original: Bhikkhunīnampi bhikkhūnaṃ sīmāya eseva nayo. Na hi te aññamaññassa kamme gaṇapūrakā
analyzed: bhikkhunīnam pi bhikkhūnam sīmāya esa iva nayaḥ na hi te aññamaññassa kamme gaṇa pūrakā

original: honti, na kammavācaṃ vaggaṃ karonti. Iti imā ekādasa vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā sīmā sammannitabbā.
analyzed: honti na kamma vācam vaggam karonti iti imāḥ ekādasa vipatti sīmāyaḥ atikkamitvā sīmā sammannitabbā

original: 157. Tividhasampattiyuttā nāma nimittasampattiyā parisasampattiyā kammavācāsampattiyā
analyzed: tividha sampatti yuttāḥ nāma nimitta sampattiyā parisa sampattiyā kamma vācā sampattiyā

original: ca yuttā. Tattha nimittasampattiyā yuttā nāma pabbatanimittaṃ pāsāṇanimittaṃ vananimittaṃ
analyzed: ca yuttā tattha nimitta sampattiyā yuttā nāma pabbata nimittam pāsāṇa nimittam vana nimittam

original: rukkhanimittaṃ magganimittaṃ vammikanimittaṃ nadīnimittaṃ udakanimittanti evaṃ vuttesu
analyzed: rukkha nimittam magga nimittam vammika nimittam nadī nimittam udaka nimittam ti evam vuttesu

original: aṭṭhasu nimittesu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge yathāladdhāni nimittupagāni nimittāni “puratthimāya
analyzed: aṭṭhasu nimittesu tasmin tasmin disā bhāge yathā laddhāni nimitta upagāni nimittāni puratthimāya

original: disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ. Pabbato, bhante. Eso pabbato nimitta”ntiādinā nayena sammā kittetvā sammatā.
analyzed: disāya kim nimittam pabbataḥ bhante eso pabbataḥ nimitta nti ādinā nayena sammā kittetvā sammatā

original: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – vinayadharena pucchitabbaṃ “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimitta”nti?
analyzed: tatra ayam vinicchayaḥ vinaya dharena pucchitabbam puratthimāya disāya kim nimittan ti

original: “Pabbato, bhante”ti. Idaṃ pana upasampanno vā ācikkhatu anupasampanno vā, vaṭṭatiyeva.
analyzed: pabbataḥ bhante ti idam pana upasampannaḥ vā ācikkhatu anupasampannaḥ vā vaṭṭatiyā iva

original: Puna vinayadharena “eso pabbato nimitta”nti evaṃ nimittaṃ kittetabbaṃ, “etaṃ pabbataṃ
analyzed: puna vinayadharena eso pabbataḥ nimittan ti evam nimittam kittetabbam etam pabbatam

original: nimittaṃ karoma, karissāma, nimittaṃ kato, nimittaṃ hotu, hoti, bhavissatī”ti evaṃ
analyzed: nimittam karoma karissāma nimittam kataḥ nimittam hotu hoti bhavissati iti evam

original: pana kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Pāsāṇādīsupi eseva nayo. Puratthimāya disāya, puratthimāya
analyzed: pana kittetum na vaṭṭati pāsāṇa ādīsu pi esā iva nayo puratthimāya disāya puratthimāya

original: anudisāya, dakkhiṇāya disāya, dakkhiṇāya anudisāya, pacchimāya disāya, pacchimāya
analyzed: anudisāya dakkhiṇāya disāya dakkhiṇāya anudisāya pacchimāya disāya pacchimāya

original: anudisāya, uttarāya disāya, uttarāya anudisāya kiṃ nimittaṃ? Udakaṃ, bhante. Etaṃ
analyzed: anudisāya uttarāya disāya uttarāya anudisāya kim nimittam udakam bhante etam

original: udakaṃ nimittanti kittetabbaṃ. Ettha pana aṭṭhapetvā puna “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ
analyzed: udakam nimittan ti kittetabbam ettha pana aṭṭhapetvā puna puratthimāya disāya kim

original: nimittaṃ? Pabbato, bhante. Eso pabbato nimitta”nti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ kittitanimittaṃ
analyzed: nimittam pabbataḥ bhante eso pabbataḥ nimittam ti evam paṭhamam kittita nimittam

original: kittetvāva ṭhapetabbaṃ. Evañhi nimittena nimittaṃ ghaṭitaṃ hoti, nimittāni sakiṃ
analyzed: evam hi nimittena nimittam ghaṭitam hoti nimittāni sakim

original: kittitānipi kittitāneva honti. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “tikkhattuṃ sīmamaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: kittitāni api kittitāni iva honti andhakaṭṭhakathāyam pana tikkhattum sīma maṇḍalam

original: bandhantena nimittaṃ kittetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: bandhantena nimittam kittetabbam ti vuttam

original: 158. Idāni nimittupagāni pabbatādīni veditabbāni – tividho pabbato suddhapaṃsupabbato
analyzed: idāni nimitta upagāni pabbata ādīni veditabbāni tividhaḥ pabbataḥ suddha paṃsupabbataḥ

original: suddhapāsāṇapabbato ubhayamissakoti. So tividhopi vaṭṭati, vālikarāsi pana na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: suddha pāsāṇa pabbato ubhaya missako ti so tividhaḥ api vaṭṭati vālika rāsi pana na vaṭṭati

original: Itaropi hatthippamāṇato omakataro na vaṭṭati, hatthippamāṇato paṭṭhāya sineruppamāṇopi
analyzed: itaraḥ api hatthi ppamāṇataḥ omakataraḥ na vaṭṭati hatthi ppamāṇataḥ paṭṭhāya sineru ppamāṇaḥ api

original: vaṭṭati. Sace catūsu disāsu cattāro tīsu vā tayo pabbatā honti, catūhi vā tīhi vā
analyzed: vaṭṭati sace catūsu disāsu cattāro tīsu vā tayo pabbatāḥ honti catūhi vā tīhi vā

original: pabbatanimittehi sammannitumpi vaṭṭati, dvīhi pana nimittehi ekena vā sammannituṃ
analyzed: pabbata nimittehi sammannitum pi vaṭṭati dvīhi pana nimittehi ekena vā sammannitum

original: na vaṭṭati. Ito paresu pāsāṇanimittādīsupi eseva nayo. Tasmā pabbatanimittaṃ karontena
analyzed: na vaṭṭati itas paresu pāsāṇa nimitta ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ tasmā pabbata nimittam karontena

original: pucchitabbaṃ “ekābaddho, na ekābaddho”ti. Sace ekābaddho hoti, na kātabbo. Tañhi
analyzed: pucchitabbam ekābaddhaḥ na ekābaddhaḥ iti sace ekābaddhaḥ hoti na kātabbaḥ tat hi

original: catūsu vā aṭṭhasu vā disāsu kittentenapi ekameva nimittaṃ kittitaṃ hoti, tasmā yo

original: evaṃ cakkasaṇṭhānena vihārampi parikkhipitvā ṭhito pabbato, taṃ ekadisāya kittetvā
analyzed: evam cakka saṇṭhānena vihāram pi parikkhipitvā ṭhitaḥ pabbataḥ tam eka disāya kittetvā

original: aññāsu disāsu taṃ bahiddhā katvā anto aññāni nimittāni kittetabbāni. Sace pabbatassa
analyzed: aññāsu disāsu tam bahiddhā katvā antar aññāni nimittāni kittetabbāni sace pabbatassa

original: tatiyabhāgaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṃ vā antosīmāya kattukāmā honti, pabbataṃ akittetvā yattakaṃ
analyzed: tatiya bhāgam vā upaḍḍham vā antosīmāya kattu kāmāḥ honti pabbatam a kittetvā yattakam

original: padesaṃ anto kattukāmā, tassa parato tasmiṃyeva pabbate jātarukkhavammikādīsu aññataraṃ
analyzed: padesam antaḥ kattu kāmā tassa paratas tasmin yeva pabbate jāta rukkha vammika ādīsu aññataram

original: nimittaṃ kittetabbaṃ. Sace ekayojanadviyojanappamāṇaṃ sabbaṃ pabbataṃ anto kattukāmā
analyzed: nimittam kittetabbam sace eka yojana dvi yojana ppamāṇam sabbam pabbatam antar kattu kāmā

original: honti, pabbatassa parato bhūmiyaṃ jātarukkhavammikādīni nimittāni kittetabbāni.
analyzed: honti pabbatassa paratas bhūmiyam jāta rukkha vammika ādīni nimittāni kittetabbāni

original: Pāsāṇanimitte ayaguḷopi pāsāṇasaṅkhyameva gacchati, tasmā yo koci pāsāṇo vaṭṭati.
analyzed: pāsāṇa nimitte ayaguḷaḥ api pāsāṇa saṅkhyam eva gacchati tasmai yaḥ koci pāsāṇaḥ vaṭṭati

analyzed: pamāṇataḥ pana hatthi ppamāṇaḥ pabbata saṅkhyam gataḥ tasmā so na vaṭṭati mahā goṇa mahā mahiṃsa ppamāṇaḥ

original: pana vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhimaparicchedena dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇo vaṭṭati, tato khuddakataro

original: paṃsuvālukarāsi. Bhūmisamo khalamaṇḍalasadiso piṭṭhipāsāṇo vā bhūmito khāṇuko viya
analyzed: bhūmi samaḥ khala maṇḍala sadisaḥ piṭṭhi pāsāṇaḥ vā bhūmitaḥ khāṇukaḥ viya

original: uṭṭhitapāsāṇo vā hoti, sopi pamāṇupago ce, vaṭṭati. Piṭṭhipāsāṇo atimahantopi pāsāṇasaṅkhyameva
analyzed: uṭṭhita pāsāṇaḥ vā hoti saḥ api pamāṇa upagaḥ ce vaṭṭati piṭṭhi pāsāṇaḥ ati mahantaḥ api pāsāṇa saṅkhyam eva

original: gacchati, tasmā sace mahato piṭṭhipāsāṇassa ekappadesaṃ antosīmāya kattukāmā honti,
analyzed: gacchati tasmai sace mahataḥ piṭṭhi pāsāṇassa eka ppadesam antosīmāya kattu kāmāḥ honti

original: taṃ akittetvā tassupari añño pāsāṇo kittetabbo. Sace piṭṭhipāsāṇupari vihāraṃ karonti,
analyzed: tam a kittetvā tassa upari aññaḥ pāsāṇaḥ kittetabbo sace piṭṭhi pāsāṇa upari vihāram karonti

original: vihāramajjhena vā piṭṭhipāsāṇo vinivijjhitvā gacchati, evarūpo piṭṭhipāsāṇo na vaṭṭati.

original: Sace hi taṃ kittenti, nimittassa upari vihāro hoti, nimittañca nāma bahisīmāya hoti,
analyzed: sace hi tam kittenti nimittassa upari vihāraḥ hoti nimittam ca nāma bahi sīmāya hoti

original: vihāropi bahisīmāyaṃ āpajjati. Vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitapiṭṭhipāsāṇo ekattha kittetvā
analyzed: vihāraḥ api bahi sīmāyam āpajjati vihāram parikkhipitvā ṭhita piṭṭhi pāsāṇaḥ ekattha kittetvā

original: aññattha na kittetabbo.
analyzed: aññattha na kittetabbaḥ

original: Vananimitte tiṇavanaṃ vā tacasāratālanāḷikerādirukkhavanaṃ vā na vaṭṭati, antosārānaṃ

analyzed: pana sākasāla ādīnam antosāra missakānam vā rukkhānam vanam vaṭṭati tat ca kho heṭṭhima paricchedena

original: catupañcarukkhamattampi, tato oraṃ na vaṭṭati, paraṃ yojanasatikampi vaṭṭati. Sace
analyzed: catu pañca rukkha mattam pi tatas oram na vaṭṭati param yojana satikam pi vaṭṭati sace

original: pana vanamajjhe vihāraṃ karonti, vanaṃ na kittetabbaṃ. Ekadesaṃ antosīmāya kātukāmehipi

analyzed: ekattha kittetvā aññattha na kittetabbam

analyzed: rukkha nimitte tacasāraḥ tāla nāḷikera ādi rukkhaḥ na vaṭṭati antosāraḥ jīvamānakaḥ antamaso

analyzed: ubbedhataḥ aṭṭha aṅgulo pariṇāhataḥ sūci daṇḍa kappamāṇaḥ api vaṭṭati tatas oram na vaṭṭati

analyzed: ropetvā vaḍḍhāpitaḥ pamāṇa upagaḥ pi na vaṭṭati tatas apanetvā pana tam khaṇam pi

analyzed: ropetvā koṭṭhakam katvā udakam āsiñcitvā kittetum vaṭṭati nava mūla sākhā niggamanam

analyzed: akāraṇam khandham chinditvā ropite pana etam yujjati ca

original: vattuṃ vaṭṭati “sākarukkho”tipi “sālarukkho”tipi. Ekābaddhaṃ pana suppatiṭṭhitanigrodhasadisaṃ

original: ekattha kittetvā aññattha kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: ekattha kittetvā aññattha kittetum na vaṭṭati

original: Magganimitte araññakhettanadītaḷākamaggādayo na vaṭṭanti, jaṅghamaggo vā sakaṭamaggo

original: okkamitvā puna sakaṭamaggameva otarati, ye vā jaṅghamaggasakaṭamaggā avaḷañjā, te
analyzed: okkamitvā puna sakaṭa maggam eva otarati ye vā jaṅgha magga sakaṭa maggāḥ avaḷañjā te

original: na vaṭṭanti, jaṅghasatthasakaṭasatthehi vaḷañjiyamānāyeva vaṭṭanti. Sace dve maggā

original: nikkhamitvā pacchā sakaṭadhuramiva ekībhavanti, dvedhā bhinnaṭṭhāne vā sambandhaṭṭhāne

original: vā sakiṃ kittetvā puna na kittetabbā. Ekābaddhanimittañhetaṃ hoti. Sace vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā

original: cattāro maggā catūsu disāsu gacchanti, majjhe ekaṃ kittetvā aparaṃ kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.

original: Ekābaddhanimittañhetaṃ. Koṇaṃ nibbijjhitvā gataṃ pana parabhāge kittetuṃ vaṭṭati.

original: Vihāramajjhena nibbijjhitvā gatamaggo pana na kittetabbo, kittite nimittassa upari

analyzed: vihāraḥ hoti sace sakaṭa maggassa antima cakka maggam nimittam karonti maggaḥ bahi sīmāya

original: sesaṃ antosīmaṃ bhajati. Maggaṃ kittentena “maggo pantho patho pajjo”tiādīsu dasasu
analyzed: sesam antosīmam bhajati maggam maggo pantho patho pajjoti ādīsu dasasu

original: yena kenaci nāmena ca kittetuṃ vaṭṭati, parikhāsaṇṭhānena vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā gatamaggo

original: ekattha kittetvā aññattha kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: ekattha kittetvā aññattha kittetum na vaṭṭati

original: Vammikanimitte heṭṭhimaparicchedena taṃ divasaṃ jāto aṭṭhaṅgulubbedho govisāṇappamāṇopi

original: Nadīnimitte yassā dhammikānaṃ rājūnaṃ kāle anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ anudasāhaṃ anupañcāhanti
analyzed: nadī nimitte yassā dhammikānam rājūnam kāle anu aḍḍhamāsam anu dasāham anu pañcāhanti

analyzed: evam deve vassante valāhakesu vigata mattesu sotam pacchijjati ayam nadī saṅkhyam

original: na gacchati. Yassā pana īdise suvuṭṭhikāle vassānassa cātumāse sotaṃ na pacchijjati,
analyzed: na gacchati yassā pana īdise su vuṭṭhi kāle vassānassa cātumāse sotam na pacchijjati

original: yattha titthena vā atitthena vā sikkhākaraṇīye āgatalakkhaṇena timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā

original: antaravāsakaṃ anukkhipitvā uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi antaravāsako

original: sukhakaraṇatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ khaṇḍasīmā bandhitabbā. Taṃ pana bandhantehi vattaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
analyzed: sukha karaṇa attham paṭhamam khaṇḍa sīmā bandhitabbā tam pana bandhantehi vattam jānitabbam

original: Sace hi bodhicetiyabhattasālādīni sabbavatthūni patiṭṭhāpetvā katavihāre bandhanti,
analyzed: sace hi bodhi cetiya bhatta sāla ādīni sabba vatthūni patiṭṭhāpetvā kata vihāre bandhanti

original: vihāramajjhe bahūnaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhāne abandhitvā vihārapaccante vivittokāse bandhitabbā.
analyzed: vihāra majjhe bahūnam samosaraṇa ṭṭhāne a bandhitvā vihāra paccante vivitta ukāse bandhitabbā

original: Akatavihāre bandhantehi bodhicetiyādīnaṃ sabbavatthūnaṃ ṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā yathā
analyzed: akata vihāre bandhantehi bodhi cetiya ādīnam sabba vatthūnam ṭhānam sallakkhetvā yathā

original: patiṭṭhitesu vatthūsu vihārapaccante vivittokāse hoti, evaṃ bandhitabbā. Sā heṭṭhimaparicchedena
analyzed: patiṭṭhitesu vatthūsu vihāra paccante vivitta ukāse hoti evam bandhitabbā sā heṭṭhima paricchedena

original: sace ekavīsati bhikkhū gaṇhāti, vaṭṭati, tato oraṃ na vaṭṭati, paraṃ bhikkhusahassaṃ
analyzed: sace ekavīsati bhikkhū gaṇhāti vaṭṭati tatas oram na vaṭṭati param bhikkhu sahassam

original: gaṇhantīpi vaṭṭati. Taṃ bandhantehi sīmamāḷakassa samantā nimittupagā pāsāṇā ṭhapetabbā,
analyzed: gaṇhantī ipi vaṭṭati tam bandhantehi sīmamāḷakassa samantā nimitta upagā pāsāṇā ṭhapetabbā

original: na khaṇḍasīmāya ṭhitehi mahāsīmā bandhitabbā, na mahāsīmāya ṭhitehi khaṇḍasīmā, khaṇḍasīmāyameva
analyzed: na khaṇḍa sīmāya ṭhitehi mahā sīmā bandhitabbā na mahā sīmāya ṭhitehi khaṇḍa sīmā khaṇḍa sīmā ayam eva

original: pana ṭhatvā khaṇḍasīmā bandhitabbā.
analyzed: pana ṭhatvā khaṇḍa sīmā bandhitabbā

original: Tatrāyaṃ bandhanavidhi – samantā “eso pāsāṇo nimitta”nti evaṃ nimittāni kittetvā
analyzed: tatra ayam bandhana vidhi evam nimittāni

original: kammavācāya sīmā sammannitabbā. Atha tassā eva daḷhīkammatthaṃ avippavāsakammavācā
analyzed: kamma vācāya sīmā sammannitabbā atha tassāḥ eva daḷhī kammattham a vippavāsa kamma vācā

original: kātabbā. Evañhi “sīmaṃ samūhanissāmā”ti āgatā samūhanituṃ na sakkhissanti. Sīmaṃ
analyzed: kātabbāḥ evam hi sīmam samūhanissāma ati āgatāḥ samūhanitum na sakkhissanti sīmam

original: sammannitvā bahi sīmantarikapāsāṇā ṭhapetabbā. Sīmantarikā pacchimakoṭiyā ekaratanappamāṇā
analyzed: sammannitvā bahi sīmantarika pāsāṇā ṭhapetabbā sīmantarikā pacchima koṭiyā eka ratana ppamāṇā

original: vaṭṭati. “Vidatthippamāṇāpi vaṭṭatī”ti kurundiyaṃ, “caturaṅgulappamāṇāpi vaṭṭatī”ti
analyzed: vaṭṭati vidatthi ppamāṇā api vaṭṭati iti kurundiyam catur aṅgula ppamāṇā api vaṭṭati iti

original: mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sace pana vihāro mahā hoti, dvepi tissopi tatuttarimpi khaṇḍasīmāyo bandhitabbā.
analyzed: mahā paccariyam vuttam sace pana vihāraḥ mahā hoti dve pi tisso pi khaṇḍa sīmāyaḥ bandhitabbā

original: Evaṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ sammannitvā mahāsīmasammutikāle khaṇḍasīmato nikkhamitvā mahāsīmāyaṃ
analyzed: evam khaṇḍa sīmam sammannitvā mahā sīma sammuti kāle khaṇḍa sīmataḥ nikkhamitvā mahā sīmāyam

original: ṭhatvā samantā anupariyāyantehi sīmantarikapāsāṇā kittetabbā, tato avasesanimittāni
analyzed: ṭhatvā samantā anupariyāyantehi sīmantarika pāsāṇā kittetabbā tatas avasesa nimittāni

original: kittetvā hatthapāsaṃ avijahantehi kammavācāya samānasaṃvāsakasīmaṃ sammannitvā tassā
analyzed: kittetvā hattha pāsam a vijahantehi kamma vācāya samāna saṃvāsaka sīmam sammannitvā tassā

original: daḷhīkammatthaṃ avippavāsakammavācāpi kātabbā. Evañhi “sīmaṃ samūhanissāmā”ti āgatā
analyzed: daḷhī kamma attham a vippavāsa kamma vācā api kātabbā evam hi sīmam samūha nissāma ati āgatā

original: samūhanituṃ na sakkhissanti. Sace pana khaṇḍasīmāya nimittāni kittetvā tato sīmantarikāya
analyzed: samūhanitum na sakkhissanti sace pana khaṇḍa sīmāya nimittāni kittetvā tatas sīmantarikāya

original: nimittāni kittetvā mahāsīmāya nimittāni kittenti, evaṃ tīsu ṭhānesu nimittāni kittetvā
analyzed: nimittāni kittetvā mahā sīmāya nimittāni kittenti evam tīsu ṭhānesu nimittāni kittetvā

original: yaṃ sīmaṃ icchanti, taṃ paṭhamaṃ bandhituṃ vaṭṭati. Evaṃ santepi yathāvuttanayena
analyzed: yam sīmam icchanti tam paṭhamam bandhitum vaṭṭati evam sante api yathāvutta nayena

original: khaṇḍasīmatova paṭṭhāya bandhitabbā. Evaṃ baddhāsu pana sīmāsu khaṇḍasīmāya ṭhitā
analyzed: khaṇḍa sīmataḥ va paṭṭhāya bandhitabbā evam baddhāsu pana sīmāsu khaṇḍa sīmāya ṭhitā

original: bhikkhū mahāsīmāya kammaṃ karontānaṃ na kopenti, mahāsīmāya vā ṭhitā khaṇḍasīmāya
analyzed: bhikkhū mahā sīmāya kammam karontānam na kopenti mahā sīmāya vā ṭhitā khaṇḍa sīmāya

original: karontānaṃ, sīmantarikāya pana ṭhitā ubhinnampi na kopenti. Gāmakhette ṭhatvā kammaṃ
analyzed: karontānam sīmantarikāya pana ṭhitāḥ ubhinnam pi na kopenti gāma khette ṭhatvā kammaṃ

original: karontānaṃ pana sīmantarikāya ṭhitā kopenti. Sīmantarikā hi gāmakhettaṃ bhajati.
analyzed: karontānam pana sīmantarikāya ṭhitā kopenti sīmantarikā hi gāma khettam bhajati

original: Sīmā ca nāmesā na kevalā pathavītaleyeva baddhā baddhā nāma hoti, atha kho piṭṭhipāsāṇepi
analyzed: sīmā ca nāma isā na kevalā baddhā baddhā nāma hoti atha kho piṭṭhi pāsāṇe pi

original: kuṭigehepi leṇepi pāsādepi pabbatamatthakepi baddhā baddhāyeva hoti. Tattha piṭṭhipāsāṇe
analyzed: kuṭi gehe pi leṇe pi pāsāde pi pabbata matthake pi baddhā baddhāya iva hoti tattha piṭṭhi pāsāṇe

original: bandhantehi pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ rājiṃ vā koṭṭetvā udukkhalaṃ vā khaṇitvā nimittaṃ na
analyzed: bandhantehi pāsāṇa piṭṭhiyam rājim vā koṭṭetvā udukkhalam vā khaṇitvā nimittam na

original: kātabbaṃ, nimittupagapāsāṇe ṭhapetvā nimittāni kittetabbāni. Kammavācāpariyosāne
analyzed: kātabbam nimitta upaga pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā nimittāni kittetabbāni kamma vācā pariyosāne

original: sīmā pathavīsandhārakaṃ udakapariyantaṃ katvā otarati. Nimittapāsāṇā yathāṭhāne na
analyzed: sīmā pathavī sandhārakam udaka pariyantam katvā otarati nimitta pāsāṇā yathāṭhāne na

original: tiṭṭhanti, tasmā samantato rāji vā upaṭṭhāpetabbā, catūsu vā koṇesu pāsāṇā vijjhitabbā,
analyzed: tiṭṭhanti tasmā samantataḥ rāji vā upaṭṭhāpetabbā catūsu vā koṇesu pāsāṇā vijjhitabbā

original: “ayaṃ sīmāparicchedo”ti vatvā akkharāni vā chinditabbāni. Keci usūyakā “sīmaṃ jhāpessāmā”ti
analyzed: ayam sīmā paricchedaḥ ti vatvā akkharāni vā chinditabbāni keci usūyakā sīmam jhāpessāma ati

original: aggiṃ denti, pāsāṇāva jhāyanti, na sīmā.
analyzed: aggim denti pāsāṇā ava jhāyanti na sīmā

original: Kuṭigehepi bhittiṃ akittetvā ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ okāsaṭṭhānaṃ antokaritvā pāsāṇanimittāni
analyzed: kuṭi gehe pi bhittim a kittetvā ekavīsatiyāḥ bhikkhūnam okāsa ṭhānam antokaritvā pāsāṇa nimittāni

original: ṭhapetvā sīmā sammannitabbā, antokuṭṭameva sīmā hoti. Sace antokuṭṭe ekavīsatiyā
analyzed: ṭhapetvā sīmā sammannitabbā antokuṭṭam eva sīmā hoti sace antokuṭṭe ekavīsatiyā

original: bhikkhūnaṃ okāso natthi, pamukhe nimittapāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sammannitabbā. Sace evampi
analyzed: bhikkhūnam okāsaḥ natthi pamukhe nimitta pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sammannitabbā sace evam pi

original: nappahoti, bahi nibbodakapatanaṭṭhānepi nimittāni ṭhapetvā sammannitabbā. Evaṃ sammatāya
analyzed: na pahoti bahi nibbodaka patana ṭhāne pi nimittāni ṭhapetvā sammannitabbā evam sammatāya

original: pana sabbaṃ kuṭigehaṃ sīmaṭṭhameva hoti.
analyzed: pana sabbam kuṭi geham sīmaṭṭham eva hoti

original: Catubhittiyaleṇepi bandhantehi kuṭṭaṃ akittetvā pāsāṇāva kittetabbā, anto okāse asati pamukhepi nimittāni ṭhapetabbāni, evaṃ leṇassa anto ca bahi ca sīmā hoti.
analyzed: catu bhittiya leṇe pi bandhantehi kuṭṭam a kittetvā pāsāṇā ava kittetabbā antar okāse asati pamukhe api nimittāni ṭhapetabbāni evam leṇassa anto ca bahi ca sīmā hoti

original: Uparipāsādepi bhittiṃ akittetvā antopāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sīmā sammannitabbā. Sace nappahoti,
analyzed: upari pāsāde pi bhittim a kittetvā antopāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sīmā sammannitabbā sace na pahoti

original: pamukhepi pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sammannitabbā. Evaṃ sammatā uparipāsādeyeva hoti, heṭṭhā
analyzed: pamukhe api pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sammannitabbā evam sammatā upari pāsādeyā iva hoti heṭṭhā

original: na otarati. Sace pana bahūsu thambhesu tulānaṃ upari katapāsādassa heṭṭhimatale kuṭṭo
analyzed: na otarati sace pana bahūsu thambhesu tulānam upari kata pāsādassa heṭṭhima tale kuṭṭaḥ

original: yathā nimittānaṃ anto hoti, evaṃ uṭṭhahitvā tulārukkhehi ekasambandho ṭhito, heṭṭhāpi
analyzed: yathā nimittānam antaḥ hoti evam uṭṭhahitvā tulā rukkhehi eka sambandhaḥ ṭhitaḥ heṭṭhā api

original: otarati, ekathambhapāsādassa pana uparitale baddhā sīmā. Sace thambhamatthake ekavīsatiyā
analyzed: otarati eka thambha pāsādassa pana upari tale baddhā sīmā sace thambha matthake ekavīsatiyā

original: bhikkhūnaṃ okāso hoti, heṭṭhā otarati. Sace pāsādabhittito niggatesu niyyūhakādīsu
analyzed: bhikkhūnam okāsaḥ hoti heṭṭhā otarati sace pāsāda bhittitaḥ niggatesu niyyūhaka ādīsu

original: pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sīmaṃ bandhanti, pāsādabhitti antosīmāya hoti. Heṭṭhā panassā otaraṇānotaraṇaṃ
analyzed: pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sīmam bandhanti pāsāda bhitti antosīmāya hoti heṭṭhā panassā otaraṇa anotaraṇam

original: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: Heṭṭhāpāsāde kittentehipi bhitti ca rukkhatthambhā ca na kittetabbā, bhittilagge
analyzed: heṭṭhā pāsāde bhitti ca rukkhatthambhā ca na kittetabbā bhitti lagge

original: pana pāsāṇatthambhe kittetuṃ vaṭṭati. Evaṃ kittitā sīmā heṭṭhāpāsādassa pariyantathambhānaṃ
analyzed: pana pāsāṇa tthambhe kittetum vaṭṭati evam kittitā sīmā heṭṭhā pāsādassa pariyanta thambhānam

original: antoyeva hoti. Sace pana heṭṭhāpāsādassa kuṭṭo uparimatalena sambaddho hoti, uparipāsādampi
analyzed: antoyā iva hoti sace pana heṭṭhā pāsādassa kuṭṭaḥ uparima talena sambaddhaḥ hoti upari pāsādam pi

original: abhiruhati. Sace pāsādassa bahi nibbodakapatanaṭṭhāne nimittāni karonti, sabbo pāsādo sīmaṭṭho hoti.
analyzed: abhiruhati sace pāsādassa bahi nibbodaka patanaṭṭhāne nimittāni karonti sabbaḥ pāsādaḥ sīmaṭṭhaḥ hoti

original: Pabbatamatthake talaṃ hoti ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ okāsārahaṃ, tattha piṭṭhipāsāṇe
analyzed: pabbata matthake talam hoti ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnam okāsa araham tattha piṭṭhi pāsāṇe

original: viya sīmaṃ bandhanti, heṭṭhāpabbatepi teneva paricchedena sīmā otarati. Tālamūlakapabbatepi
analyzed: viya sīmam bandhanti heṭṭhā pabbate pi tena iva paricchedena sīmā otarati tālamūlaka pabbate pi

original: upari sīmā baddhā heṭṭhā otarateva. Yo pana vitānasaṇṭhāno hoti, upari ekavīsatiyā
analyzed: upari sīmā baddhā heṭṭhā yaḥ pana vitāna saṇṭhānaḥ hoti upari ekavīsatiyā

original: bhikkhūnaṃ okāso atthi, heṭṭhā natthi, tassupari baddhā sīmā heṭṭhā na otarati. Evaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhūnaṃ okāsaḥ atthi heṭṭhā natthi tassa upari baddhā sīmā heṭṭhā na otarati evam

original: mudiṅgasaṇṭhāno vā hotu paṇavasaṇṭhāno vā, yassa heṭṭhā vā majjhe vā sīmappamāṇaṃ
analyzed: mudiṅga saṇṭhānaḥ vā hotu paṇava saṇṭhānaḥ vā yassa heṭṭhā vā majjhe vā sīma ppamāṇam

original: natthi, tassa upari baddhā sīmā heṭṭhā na otarati. Yassa pana dve kūṭāni āsanne ṭhitāni,
analyzed: natthi tassa upari baddhā sīmā heṭṭhā na otarati yassa pana dve kūṭāni āsanne ṭhitāni

original: ekassapi upari sīmappamāṇaṃ nappahoti, tassa kūṭantaraṃ cinitvā vā pūretvā vā ekābaddhaṃ
analyzed: ekassa api upari sīma ppamāṇam na ppahoti tassa kūṭa antaram cinitvā vā pūretvā vā eka ābaddham

original: katvā upari sīmā sammannitabbā. Eko sappaphaṇasadiso pabbato, tassa upari sīmappamāṇassa
analyzed: katvā upari sīmā sammannitabbā ekaḥ sappa phaṇa sadiso pabbato tassa upari sīma ppamāṇassa

original: atthitāya sīmaṃ bandhanti, tassa ce heṭṭhā ākāsapabbhāraṃ hoti, sīmā na otarati.
analyzed: atthitāya sīmam bandhanti tassa ce heṭṭhā ākāsa pabbhāram hoti sīmā na otarati

original: Sace panassa vemajjhe sīmappamāṇo susirapāsāṇo hoti, otarati, so ca pāsāṇo sīmaṭṭhoyeva
analyzed: sace pana assa vemajjhe sīma ppamāṇaḥ susira pāsāṇaḥ hoti otarati saḥ ca pāsāṇaḥ

original: hoti. Athāpissa heṭṭhāleṇassa kuṭṭo aggakoṭiṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati, otarati, heṭṭhā ca
analyzed: hoti atha apissa heṭṭhāleṇassa kuṭṭaḥ agga koṭim āhacca tiṭṭhati otarati heṭṭhā ca

original: upari ca sīmāyeva hoti. Sace pana heṭṭhā uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa pārato antoleṇaṃ
analyzed: upari ca sīmāya iva hoti sace pana heṭṭhā uparimassa sīmā paricchedassa pāratas

original: hoti, bahi sīmā na otarati. Athāpi uparimassa sīmāparicchedassa orato bahi leṇaṃ
analyzed: hoti bahi sīmā na otarati atha api uparimassa sīmā paricchedassa oratas bahi leṇam

original: hoti, anto sīmā na otarati. Athāpi upari sīmāparicchedo khuddako, heṭṭhā leṇaṃ mahantaṃ
analyzed: hoti antar sīmā na otarati atha api upari sīmā paricchedaḥ khuddakaḥ heṭṭhā leṇam mahantam

original: sīmāparicchedamatikkamitvā ṭhitaṃ, sīmā upariyeva hoti, heṭṭhā na otarati. Yadi pana
analyzed: sīmā paricchedam atikkamitvā ṭhitam sīmā upariyā iva hoti heṭṭhā na otarati yadi pana

original: leṇaṃ khuddakaṃ sabbapacchimasīmāparimāṇaṃ, upari sīmā mahatī naṃ ajjhottharitvā
analyzed: leṇam khuddakam sabba pacchima sīmā parimāṇam upari sīmā mahatī naṃ ajjhottharitvā

original: ṭhitā, sīmā otarati. Atha leṇaṃ atikhuddakaṃ sīmappamāṇaṃ na hoti, sīmā upariyeva
analyzed: ṭhitā sīmā otarati atha leṇam ati khuddakam sīma ppamāṇam na hoti sīmā upariyā iva

original: hoti, heṭṭhā na otarati. Sace tato upaḍḍhaṃ bhijjitvā patati, sīmappamāṇaṃ cepi hoti,
analyzed: hoti heṭṭhā na otarati sace tatas upaḍḍham bhijjitvā patati sīma ppamāṇam ce ipi hoti

original: bahi patitaṃ asīmā. Apatitaṃ pana yadi sīmappamāṇaṃ, sīmā hotiyeva.
analyzed: bahi patitam a sīmā a patitam pana yadi sīma ppamāṇam sīmā

original: Khaṇḍasīmā ca nīcavatthukā hoti, taṃ pūretvā uccavatthukaṃ karonti, sīmāyeva. Sīmāya
analyzed: khaṇḍa sīmā ca nīca vatthukā hoti tam pūretvā ucca vatthukam karonti sīmāya iva sīmāya

original: gehaṃ karonti, sīmaṭṭhakameva hoti. Sīmāya pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇanti, sīmāyeva. Ogho sīmāmaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: geham karonti sīmaṭṭhakam eva hoti sīmāya pokkharaṇim khaṇanti sīmāya iva oghaḥ sīmā maṇḍalam

original: ottharitvā gacchati, sīmāmāḷake aṭṭaṃ bandhitvā kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sīmāya heṭṭhā
analyzed: ottharitvā gacchati sīmā māḷake aṭṭam bandhitvā kammam kātum vaṭṭati sīmāya heṭṭhā

original: umaṅganadī hoti, iddhimā bhikkhu tattha nisīdati. Sace sā nadī paṭhamaṃ gatā, sīmā
analyzed: umaṅga nadī hoti iddhimā bhikkhu tattha nisīdati sace sā nadī paṭhamam gatā sīmā

original: pacchā baddhā, kammaṃ na kopeti. Atha paṭhamaṃ sīmā baddhā, pacchā nadī gatā, kammaṃ
analyzed: pacchā baddhā kammam na kopeti atha paṭhamam sīmā baddhā pacchā nadī gatā kammaṃ

original: kopeti, heṭṭhāpathavītale ṭhito pana kopetiyeva.
analyzed: kopeti heṭṭhā pathavī tale ṭhitaḥ pana

original: Sīmāmāḷake vaṭarukkho hoti, tassa sākhā vā tato niggatapāroho vā mahāsīmāya pathavītalaṃ
analyzed: sīmāmāḷake vaṭa rukkho hoti tassa sākhā vā tatas niggata pārohaḥ vā mahā sīmāya pathavī talam

original: vā tatthajātarukkhādīni vā āhacca tiṭṭhati, mahāsīmaṃ vā sodhetvā kammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
analyzed: vā tattha jāta rukkha ādīni vā āhacca tiṭṭhati mahā sīmam vā sodhetvā kammam kātabbam

original: te vā sākhāpārohā chinditvā bahiṭṭhakā kātabbā. Anāhacca ṭhitasākhādīsu āruḷhabhikkhū

analyzed: jātam yam kiñci yattha katthaci eka sambandhena gatam sīmā saṅkhyam eva gacchati iti

original: ñatvāyeva samūhanitabbā ceva bandhitabbā cāti. Ayaṃ tāva baddhasīmāya vinicchayo.

original: 166. Abaddhasīmā pana gāmasīmā sattabbhantarasīmā udakukkhepasīmāti tividhā. Tattha
analyzed: abaddha sīmā pana gāma sīmā satta abbhantara sīmā udakukkhepa sīmā ati tividhā tattha
