analyzed: yāvatā ekam gāma khettam ayam gāma sīmā nāma gāma ggahaṇena ca ittha nagaram pi nigamam pi

original: gahitameva hoti. Tattha yattake padese tassa tassa gāmassa gāmabhojakā baliṃ labhanti,
analyzed: gahitam eva hoti tattha yattake padese tassa tassa gāmassa gāma bhojakāḥ balim labhanti

original: so padeso appo vā hotu mahanto vā, gāmasīmātveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Nagaranigamasīmāsupi
analyzed: saḥ padesaḥ appaḥ vā hotu mahantaḥ vā gāma sīmā tu eva saṅkhyam gacchati nagara nigama sīmāsu pi

analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ yam pi ekasmin yā iva gāma khette ekam padesam ayam visuṃgāmaḥ hotu iti paricchinditvā

analyzed: rājā kassaci deti saḥ api visuṃgāma sīmā tasmai sā ca itarā ca pakati gāma nagara nigama sīmā

analyzed: baddha sīmā sadisāya iva honti kevalam pana ti cīvara vippavāsa parihāram na labhanti

original: Agāmake pana araññe samantā sattabbhantarā sattabbhantarasīmā nāma. Tattha agāmakaṃ
analyzed: agāmake pana araññe samantā sattabbhantarā sattabbhantarasīmā nāma tattha agāmakam

original: nāma araññaṃ viñjhāṭavīādīsu vā samuddamajjhe vā macchabandhānaṃ agamanapathe dīpakesu

analyzed: labbhati samantā satta abbhantarā ati majjhe ṭhitānam sabba disāsu satta abbhantarā vinibbedhena

original: cuddasa honti. Tattha ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ aṭṭhavīsatihatthappamāṇaṃ hoti. Ayañca sīmā
analyzed: cuddasa honti tattha ekam abbhantaram aṭṭhavīsati hattha ppamāṇam hoti ayam ca sīmā

analyzed: parisa vasena vaḍḍhati tasmā paṭṭhāya abbhantara paricchedo

analyzed: kātabbaḥ sace pana dve saṅghāḥ visum uposatham karonti

original: 167. Yā panesā “sabbā, bhikkhave, nadī asīmā, sabbo samuddo asīmo, sabbo jātassaro
analyzed: yā pana esā sabbā bhikkhave nadī asīmā sabbaḥ samuddaḥ asīmaḥ sabbaḥ jātassaro

analyzed: samuddaḥ api pākaṭaḥ yā iva yaḥ pana yena kenacid khaṇitvā akataḥ sayaṃjāto

original: Kathaṃ pana udakukkhepo kātabboti? Yathā akkhadhuttā dāruguḷaṃ khipanti, evaṃ udakaṃ

analyzed: tatra api upari aḍḍha yojanam pahāya heṭṭhā aḍḍha yojane kammam kātum vaṭṭati iti tam

original: kadāci na ottharanti, tattha kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. So hi gāmasīmāsaṅkhyameva gacchati.
analyzed: kadāci na ottharanti tattha kammam kātum na vaṭṭati saḥ hi gāma sīmā saṅkhyam eva gacchati

original: Sace pana vīcīsu āgatāsupi anāgatāsupi pakatiudakeneva ottharīyati, vaṭṭati. Dīpako
analyzed: sace pana vīcīsu āgatāsu api anāgatāsu api pakati udakena iva ottharīyati vaṭṭati dīpakaḥ

original: vā pabbato vā hoti, so ce dūre hoti macchabandhānaṃ agamanapathe, araññasīmāsaṅkhyameva
analyzed: vā pabbataḥ vā hoti saḥ ce dūre hoti macchabandhānam a gamana pathe arañña sīmā saṅkhyam eva

original: gacchati. Tesaṃ gamanapariyantassa orato pana gāmasīmāsaṅkhyaṃ gacchati, tattha gāmasīmaṃ

original: tiṭṭhati, samuddova hoti, tattha kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace pana vihārasīmaṃ ottharati,

original: vihārasīmātveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.

original: saṅgharitabbaṃ. Kiṃkāraṇā? Mā majjhe bhaṅgo ahosīti. Samaṃ katvā saṅgharitassa hi
analyzed: saṅgharitabbam kiṃkāraṇā mā majjhe bhaṅgaḥ ahosi iti samam katvā saṅgharitassa hi

original: majjhe bhaṅgo hoti, tato niccaṃ bhijjamānaṃ dubbalaṃ hoti, taṃ nivāraṇatthametaṃ
analyzed: majjhe bhaṅgaḥ hoti tatas niccam bhijjamānam dubbalam hoti tam nivāraṇa attham etam

original: vuttaṃ. Tasmā yathā ajja bhaṅgaṭṭhāneyeva sve na bhijjissati, tathā divase divase
analyzed: vuttam tasmai yathā ajja bhaṅga ṭṭhānā iyā iva sve na bhijjissati tathā divase divase

original: caturaṅgulaṃ ussāretvā saṅgharitabbaṃ, obhoge kāyabandhanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: catur aṅgulam ussāretvā saṅgharitabbam obhoge kāyabandhanam kātabbam

original: Sace piṇḍapāto hoti, upajjhāyo ca bhuñjitukāmo hoti, udakaṃ datvā piṇḍapāto upanāmetabbo,
analyzed: sace piṇḍapātaḥ hoti upajjhāyaḥ ca bhuñjitu kāmaḥ hoti udakam datvā piṇḍapātaḥ upanāmetabbaḥ

original: upajjhāyo pānīyena pucchitabbo. Pucchantena ca tikkhattuṃ “pānīyaṃ, bhante, āharīyatū”ti
analyzed: upajjhāyaḥ pānīyena pucchitabbo pucchantena ca tikkhattum pānīyam bhante āharīyatu uti

original: pānīyena pucchitabbo. Sace kālo atthi, upajjhāye bhutte sayaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ. Sace
analyzed: pānīyena pucchitabbaḥ sace kālaḥ atthi upajjhāye bhutte sayam bhuñjitabbam sace

original: upakaṭṭho kālo, pānīyaṃ upajjhāyassa santike ṭhapetvā sayampi bhuñjitabbaṃ. Bhuttāvissa
analyzed: upakaṭṭhaḥ kālaḥ pānīyam upajjhāyassa santike ṭhapetvā sayam pi bhuñjitabbam bhutta avissa

original: udakaṃ datvā pattaṃ paṭiggahetvā nīcaṃ katvā sādhukaṃ appaṭighaṃsantena dhovitvā
analyzed: udakam datvā pattam paṭiggahetvā nīcam katvā sādhukam a paṭighaṃsantena dhovitvā

original: vodakaṃ katvā muhuttaṃ uṇhe otāpetabbo, na ca uṇhe patto nidahitabbo, pattacīvaraṃ
analyzed: vodakam katvā muhuttam uṇhe otāpetabbaḥ na ca uṇhe pattaḥ nidahitabbo patta cīvaram

original: nikkhipitabbaṃ. Pattaṃ nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattaṃ gahetvā ekena hatthena
analyzed: nikkhipitabbam pattam nikkhipantena ekena hatthena pattam gahetvā ekena hatthena

original: heṭṭhāmañcaṃ vā heṭṭhāpīṭhaṃ vā parāmasitvā patto nikkhipitabbo, na ca taṭṭikacammakhaṇḍādīhi
analyzed: heṭṭhāmañcam vā heṭṭhā pīṭham vā parāmasitvā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbaḥ na ca taṭṭika camma khaṇḍa ādīhi

original: anantarahitāya bhūmiyā patto nikkhipitabbo. Sace pana kāḷavaṇṇakatā vā sudhābaddhā
analyzed: anantara hitāya bhūmiyā pattaḥ nikkhipitabbo sace pana kāḷa vaṇṇa katā vā sudhā baddhā

analyzed: vā bhūmi niraja mattikā tathārūpāya bhūmiyā vaṭṭati

analyzed: ṭhapetum vaṭṭati paṃsu raja sakkhara ādīsu na vaṭṭati tatra pana paṇṇam vā ādhārakam

original: ekena hatthena cīvaravaṃsaṃ vā cīvararajjuṃ vā pamajjitvā pārato antaṃ orato bhogaṃ
analyzed: ekena hatthena cīvara vaṃsam vā cīvara rajjum vā pamajjitvā pāratas antam oratas bhogam

original: katvā cīvaraṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ. Idañca cīvaravaṃsādīnaṃ heṭṭhā hatthaṃ pavesetvā abhimukhena
analyzed: katvā cīvaram nikkhipitabbam idam ca cīvara vaṃsa ādīnam heṭṭhā hattham pavesetvā abhimukhena

original: hatthena saṇikaṃ nikkhipanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Ante pana gahetvā bhogena cīvaravaṃsādīnaṃ
analyzed: hatthena saṇikam nikkhipana attham vuttam ante pana gahetvā bhogena cīvara vaṃsa ādīnam

analyzed: upari khipantassa bhittiyam bhogo paṭihaññati tasmā tathā na kātabbam upajjhāyamhi

analyzed: vuṭṭhite āsanam uddharitabbam pāda udakam pāda pīṭham pāda kathalikam paṭisāmetabbam

analyzed: sace saḥ desaḥ uklāpaḥ hoti saḥ desaḥ sammajjitabbo

original: Sace upajjhāyo nahāyitukāmo hoti, nahānaṃ paṭiyādetabbaṃ. Sace sītena attho hoti, sītaṃ paṭiyādetabbaṃ. Sace uṇhena attho hoti, uṇhaṃ paṭiyādetabbaṃ.
analyzed: sace upajjhāyaḥ nahāyitu kāmaḥ hoti nahānam paṭiyādetabbam sace sītena atthaḥ hoti sītam paṭiyādetabbam sace uṇhena atthaḥ hoti uṇham paṭiyādetabbam

analyzed: dātabbā sace ussahati jantāgharam pavisitabbam pavisantena mattikāya mukham makkhetvā

analyzed: puratas ca pacchatas ca paṭicchādetvā jantāgharam pavisitabbam na there bhikkhū an upakhajja

analyzed: nisīditabbam na navāḥ bhikkhū āsanena paṭibāhitabbāḥ jantāghare upajjhāyassa parikammam

analyzed: jantāgharā nikkhamantena jantāghara pīṭham ādāya puratas ca pacchatas ca paṭicchādetvā

original: parivattetabbaṃ, ārāmavatthunā ca mahantena vā khuddakena vā ārāmaārāmavatthuvihāravihāravatthūni.
analyzed: parivattetabbam ārāma vatthunā ca mahantena vā khuddakena vā ārāma ārāma vatthu vihāra vihāra vatthūni

original: Kathaṃ vihārena vihāro parivattetabbo? Saṅghassa antogāme gehaṃ hoti, manussānaṃ
analyzed: katham vihārena vihāraḥ parivattetabbaḥ saṅghassa antogāme geham hoti manussānam

original: vihāramajjhe pāsādo hoti, ubhopi agghena samakā, sace manussā tena pāsādena taṃ gehaṃ
analyzed: vihāra majjhe pāsādaḥ hoti ubho pi agghena samakā sace manussā tena pāsādena tam geham

original: yācanti, sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhūnaṃ ce mahagghataraṃ gehaṃ hoti, “mahagghataraṃ
analyzed: yācanti sampaṭicchitum vaṭṭati bhikkhūnam ce mahagghataram geham hoti mahagghataram

original: amhākaṃ geha”nti vutte ca “kiñcāpi mahagghataraṃ pabbajitānaṃ asāruppaṃ, na sakkā
analyzed: amhākam geham ti vutte ca kiñcā api mahagghataram pabbajitānam a sāruppam na sakkā

original: tattha pabbajitehi vasituṃ, idaṃ pana sāruppaṃ, gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, evampi sampaṭicchituṃ
analyzed: tattha pabbajitehi vasitum idam pana sāruppam gaṇhatha ati vadanti evam pi sampaṭicchitum

original: vaṭṭati. Sace pana manussānaṃ mahagghaṃ hoti, “nanu tumhākaṃ gehaṃ mahaggha”nti vattabbaṃ.
analyzed: vaṭṭati sace pana manussānam mahaggham hoti nanu tumhākam geham mahagghanti vattabbam

original: “Hotu, bhante, amhākaṃ puññaṃ bhavissati, gaṇhathā”ti vutte pana sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: hotu bhante amhākam puññam bhavissati gaṇhatha ati vutte pana sampaṭicchitum vaṭṭati

original: Evampi vihārena vihāro parivattetabbo. Eteneva nayena vihāravatthupi ārāmopi ārāmavatthupi
analyzed: evam pi vihārena vihāraḥ etena iva nayena vihāra vatthu pi ārāmaḥ pi ārāma vatthu pi

original: vihārena parivattetabbaṃ, vihāravatthunā ca mahagghena vā appagghena vā vihāravihāravatthuārāmaārāmavatthūni.
analyzed: vihārena parivattetabbam vihāra vatthunā ca mahagghena vā appagghena vā vihāra vihāra vatthu ārāma ārāma vatthūni

original: Evaṃ thāvarena thāvaraparivattanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam thāvarena thāvara parivattanam veditabbam

original: Garubhaṇḍena garubhaṇḍaparivattane pana mañcapīṭhaṃ mahantaṃ vā hotu khuddakaṃ vā,
analyzed: garubhaṇḍena garubhaṇḍa parivattane pana mañca pīṭham mahantam vā hotu khuddakam vā

original: antamaso caturaṅgulapādakaṃ gāmadārakehi paṃsvāgārakesu kīḷantehi katampi saṅghassa
analyzed: antamasaḥ caturaṅgula pādakam gāma dārakehi paṃsu āgārakesu kīḷantehi katam pi saṅghassa

original: dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Sacepi rājarājamahāmattādayo ekappahāreneva
analyzed: dinna kālato paṭṭhāya garu bhaṇḍam hoti sace pi rāja rāja mahāmatta ādayo eka ppahārena iva

original: mañcasataṃ vā mañcasahassaṃ vā denti, sabbe kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbā, sampaṭicchitvā
analyzed: mañca satam vā mañca sahassam vā denti sabbe kappiya mañcā sampaṭicchitabbā sampaṭicchitvā

original: “vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjathā”ti dātabbā, puggalikavasena na
analyzed: vuḍḍha paṭipāṭiyā saṅghika paribhogena paribhuñjatha ati dātabbā puggalika vasena na

original: dātabbā. Atirekamañce bhaṇḍāgārādīsu paññapetvā pattacīvaraṃ nikkhipitumpi vaṭṭati.
analyzed: dātabbā atireka mañce bhaṇḍāgāra ādīsu paññapetvā patta cīvaram nikkhipitum pi vaṭṭati

original: Bahisīmāya “saṅghassa demā”ti dinnamañco saṅghattherassa vasanaṭṭhāne dātabbo. Tattha
analyzed: bahi sīmāya saṅghassa dema ati dinna mañcaḥ saṅgha ttherassa vasanaṭṭhāne dātabbo tattha

original: ce bahū mañcā honti, mañcena kammaṃ natthi. Yassa vasanaṭṭhāne kammaṃ atthi, tattha
analyzed: ce bahū mañcāḥ honti mañcena kammam natthi yassa vasanaṭṭhāne kammam atthi tattha

original: “saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjathā”ti dātabbo. Mahagghena satagghanakena vā sahassagghanakena
analyzed: saṅghika paribhogena paribhuñjatha ati dātabbaḥ mahagghena sata ghanakena vā sahassa ghanakena

original: vā mañcena aññaṃ mañcasataṃ labhati, parivattetvā gahetabbaṃ. Na kevalaṃ mañcena
analyzed: vā mañcena aññam mañca satam labhati parivattetvā gahetabbam na kevalam mañcena

original: mañcoyeva, ārāmaārāmavatthuvihāravihāravatthupīṭhabhisibimbohanānipi parivattetuṃ
analyzed: ārāma ārāma vatthu vihāra vihāra vatthu pīṭha bhisi bimbohanāni pi

original: vaṭṭanti. Esa nayo pīṭhabhisibimbohanesupi. Etesu pana akappiyaṃ na paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
analyzed: vaṭṭanti esa nayaḥ pīṭha bhisi bimbohanesu pi etesu pana akappiyam na paribhuñjitabbam

original: kappiyaṃ saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Akappiyaṃ vā mahagghaṃ kappiyaṃ vā
analyzed: kappiyam saṅghika paribhogena paribhuñjitabbam akappiyam vā mahaggham kappiyam vā

original: parivattetvā vuttavatthūni gahetabbāni. Agarubhaṇḍupagaṃ pana bhisibimbohanaṃ nāma natthi.
analyzed: parivattetvā vutta vatthūni gahetabbāni agaru bhaṇḍa upagam pana bhisibimbohanam nāma natthi

original: 229. Lohakumbhī lohabhāṇakaṃ lohakaṭāhanti imāni tīṇi mahantāni vā hontu khuddakāni
analyzed: loha kumbhī loha bhāṇakam loha kaṭāhanti imāni tīṇi mahantāni vā hontu khuddakāni

original: vā, antamaso pasatamattaudakagaṇhanakānipi garubhaṇḍāniyeva. Lohavārako pana kāḷalohatambalohavaṭṭalohakaṃsalohānaṃ
analyzed: vā pana kāḷa loha tamba loha vaṭṭa loha kaṃsa lohānam

original: yena kenaci kato sīhaḷadīpe pādagaṇhanako bhājetabbo. Pādo ca nāma magadhanāḷiyā
analyzed: yena kenacid kataḥ sīhaḷadīpe pāda gaṇhanakaḥ bhājetabbo pādo ca nāma magadha nāḷiyā

original: pañcanāḷimattaṃ gaṇhāti, tato atirekagaṇhanako garubhaṇḍaṃ. Imāni tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni
analyzed: gaṇhāti tatas atireka gaṇhanakaḥ imāni tāva āgatāni

original: lohabhājanāni. Pāḷiyaṃ pana anāgatāni bhiṅgārapaṭiggahauḷauṅkadabbikaṭacchupātitaṭṭakasarakasamuggaaṅgārakapalladhūmakaṭacchuādīni
analyzed: loha bhājanāni pāḷiyam pana anāgatāni bhiṅgāra paṭiggaha oḷauṅka dabbi kaṭacchu pātitaṭṭaka saraka samugga aṅgāraka palla dhūmakaṭacchu ādīni

original: khuddakāni vā mahantāni vā sabbāni garubhaṇḍāni. Patto ayathālakaṃ tambalohathālakanti
analyzed: khuddakāni vā mahantāni vā sabbāni garubhaṇḍāni patto ayathālakam tamba loha thālakam ti

original: imāni pana bhājanīyāni. Kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohabhājanavikati saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭā
analyzed: imāni pana bhājanīyāni saṅghika paribhogena vā gihi vikaṭā

original: vā vaṭṭati, puggalikaparibhogena na vaṭṭati. Kaṃsalohādibhājanaṃ saṅghassa dinnampi
analyzed: vā vaṭṭati puggalika paribhogena na vaṭṭati kaṃsa loha ādi bhājanam saṅghassa dinnam pi

original: hi pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭati, gihivikaṭanīhāreneva paribhuñjitabbanti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: hi pārihāriyam na vaṭṭati gihi vikaṭa nīhārena iva paribhuñjitabban ti mahā paccariyam vuttam

original: Ṭhapetvā pana bhājanavikatiṃ aññasmimpi kappiyalohabhaṇḍe añjanī añjanisalākā kaṇṇamalaharaṇī
analyzed: ṭhapetvā pana bhājana vikatim aññasmim pi kappiya loha bhaṇḍe añjanī añjani salākā kaṇṇa mala haraṇī

original: sūci paṇṇasūci khuddako pipphalako khuddakaṃ ārakaṇṭakaṃ kuñcikā tāḷaṃ kattarayaṭṭhi
analyzed: sūci paṇṇasūci khuddako pipphalako khuddakam ārakaṇṭakam kuñcikā tāḷam kattarayaṭṭhi

original: vedhako natthudānaṃ bhiṇḍivālo lohakūṭo lohakutti lohaguḷo lohapiṇḍi lohacakkalikaṃ
analyzed: vedhakaḥ natthudānam bhiṇḍivālaḥ lohakūṭaḥ lohakutti lohaguḷaḥ lohapiṇḍi lohacakkalikam

original: aññampi vippakatalohabhaṇḍaṃ bhājanīyaṃ. Dhūmanettaphāladīparukkhadīpakapallakaolambakadīpaitthipurisatiracchānagatarūpakāni
analyzed: aññam pi vippa kata loha bhaṇḍam bhājanīyam dhūma netta phāla dīpa rukkha dīpaka pallaka olambaka dīpa aitthi purisa tiracchāna gata rūpakāni

original: pana aññāni vā bhitticchadanakavāṭādīsu upanetabbāni antamaso lohakhilakaṃ upādāya
analyzed: pana aññāni vā bhitti chadana kavāṭa ādīsu upanetabbāni antamasaḥ loha khilakam upādāya

original: sabbāni lohabhaṇḍāni garubhaṇḍāniyeva honti, attanā laddhānipi pariharitvā puggalikaparibhogena
analyzed: sabbāni loha bhaṇḍāni garu bhaṇḍāni iva honti attanā laddhāni pi pariharitvā puggalika paribhogena

original: na paribhuñjitabbāni, saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭāni vā vaṭṭanti. Tipubhaṇḍepi
analyzed: na paribhuñjitabbāni saṅghika paribhogena vā gihi vikaṭāni vā vaṭṭanti tipu bhaṇḍe pi

original: eseva nayo. Khīrapāsāṇamayāni taṭṭakasarakādīni garubhaṇḍāniyeva.
analyzed: khīra pāsāṇa mayāni taṭṭaka saraka ādīni

original: Ghaṭako pana telabhājanaṃ vā pādagaṇhanakato atirekameva garubhaṇḍaṃ. Suvaṇṇarajatahārakūṭajātiphalikabhājanāni
analyzed: ghaṭakaḥ pana tela bhājanam vā pāda gaṇhanakataḥ atirekam eva garu bhaṇḍam suvaṇṇa rajata hārakūṭa jātiphalika bhājanāni

original: gihivikaṭānipi na vaṭṭanti, pageva saṅghikaparibhogena vā puggalikaparibhogena vā.
analyzed: gihi vikaṭāni pi na vaṭṭanti pagā iva saṅghika paribhogena vā puggalika paribhogena vā

original: Senāsanaparibhoge pana āmāsampi anāmāsampi sabbaṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: senāsana paribhoge pana āmāsam pi anāmāsam pi sabbam vaṭṭati

original: Vāsiādīsu yāya vāsiyā ṭhapetvā dantakaṭṭhacchedanaṃ vā ucchutacchanaṃ vā aññaṃ mahākammaṃ
analyzed: vāsi ādīsu yāya vāsiyā ṭhapetvā danta kaṭṭha chedanam vā ucchutacchanam vā aññam mahākammaṃ

original: kātuṃ na sakkā, ayaṃ bhājanīyā. Tato mahantatarā yena kenaci ākārena katā vāsi garubhaṇḍameva.
analyzed: kātum na sakkā ayam bhājanīyā tatas mahantatarā yena kenacid ākārena katā vā asi

original: Pharasu pana antamaso vejjānaṃ sirāvedhanapharasupi garubhaṇḍameva. Kuṭhāriyaṃ pharasusadisoyeva
analyzed: pana antamasaḥ vejjānam sirāvedhana pharasupi garu bhaṇḍam eva kuṭhāriyam

original: vinicchayo. Yā pana āvudhasaṅkhepena katā, ayaṃ anāmāsā. Kudālo antamaso caturaṅgulamattopi
analyzed: vinicchayaḥ yā pana āvudha saṅkhepena katā ayam catur aṅgula mattaḥ api

original: garubhaṇḍameva. Nikhādanaṃ caturassamukhaṃ vā hotu doṇimukhaṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā ujukaṃ
analyzed: garu bhaṇḍam eva nikhādanam catur assa mukham vā hotu doṇi mukham vā vaṅkam vā ujukam

original: vā, antamaso sammuñjanīdaṇḍakavedhanampi daṇḍabaddhaṃ ce, garubhaṇḍameva. Sammuñjanīdaṇḍakhaṇanakaṃ
analyzed: vā sammuñjanī daṇḍaka vedhanam pi daṇḍa baddham garu bhaṇḍam eva sammuñjanī daṇḍa khaṇanakam

original: pana adaṇḍakaṃ phalamattameva. Yaṃ sakkā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharituṃ, taṃ
analyzed: pana adaṇḍakam phala mattam eva yam sakkā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharitum tam

original: bhājanīyaṃ. Sikharampi nikhādaneneva saṅgahitaṃ. Yehi manussehi vihāre vāsiādīni
analyzed: bhājanīyam sikharam pi nikhādanena iva saṅgahitam yehi manussehi vihāre vāsi ādīni

original: dinnāni honti, te ce ghare daḍḍhe vā corehi vā vilutte “detha no, bhante, upakaraṇe,
analyzed: dinnāni honti te ce ghare daḍḍhe vā corehi vā vilutte detha naḥ bhante upakaraṇe

original: puna pākatike karissāmā”ti vadanti, dātabbā. Sace āharanti, na vāretabbā, anāharantāpi na codetabbā.
analyzed: puna pākatike karissāma ati vadanti dātabbā sace āharanti na vāretabbā an āharantā api na codetabbā

original: Kammāratacchakāracundakāranaḷakāramaṇikārapattabandhakānaṃ adhikaraṇimuṭṭhikasaṇḍāsatulādīni
analyzed: kammāra tacchakāra cundakāra naḷakāra maṇikāra pattabandhakānam adhikaraṇi muṭṭhika saṇḍāsa tulā ādīni

original: sabbāni lohamayaupakaraṇāni saṅghe dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍāni. Tipukoṭṭakasuvaṇṇakāracammakāraupakaraṇesupi
analyzed: sabbāni loha maya upakaraṇāni saṅghe dinna kālataḥ paṭṭhāya garu bhaṇḍāni tipu koṭṭaka suvaṇṇakāra cammakāra upakaraṇesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tipukoṭṭakaupakaraṇesupi tipucchedanakasatthakaṃ,
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ ayam pana visesaḥ tipu koṭṭaka upakaraṇesu pi tipu chedanaka satthakam

original: suvaṇṇakāraupakaraṇesu suvaṇṇacchedanakasatthakaṃ, cammakāraupakaraṇesu kataparikammacammacchedanakakhuddakasatthakanti
analyzed: suvaṇṇakāra upakaraṇesu suvaṇṇa chedanaka satthakam cammakāra upakaraṇesu kata parikamma camma chedanaka khuddaka satthakanti

original: imāni bhājanīyabhaṇḍāni. Nahāpitatunnakāraupakaraṇesupi ṭhapetvā mahākattariṃ mahāsaṇḍāsaṃ
analyzed: imāni bhājanīya bhaṇḍāni ṭhapetvā mahā kattarim mahā saṇḍāsam

original: mahāpipphalikañca sabbaṃ bhājanīyaṃ, mahākattariādīni garubhaṇḍāni.
analyzed: mahāpipphalikam ca sabbam bhājanīyam mahā kattari ādīni garu bhaṇḍāni

original: Valliādīsu vettavalliādikā yā kāci aḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā valli saṅghassa dinnā vā tatthajātakā
analyzed: valli ādīsu vetta valli ādikā yā kāci aḍḍha bāhu ppamāṇā valli saṅghassa dinnā vā tattha jātakā

original: vā rakkhitagopitā garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, sā saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate sace atirekā
analyzed: vā rakkhita gopitā garu bhaṇḍam hoti sā saṅgha kamme ca cetiya kamme ca kate sace atirekā

original: hoti, puggalikakammepi upanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Arakkhitā pana garubhaṇḍameva na hoti. Suttamakacivākanāḷikerahīracammamayā
analyzed: hoti puggalika kamme pi upanetum vaṭṭati arakkhitā pana garu bhaṇḍam eva na hoti suttamaka civāka nāḷikera hīra camma mayā

original: rajjukā vā yottāni vā vāke ca nāḷikerahīre ca vaṭṭetvā katā ekavaṭṭā vā dvivaṭṭā
analyzed: rajjukā vā yottāni vā vāke ca nāḷikera hīre ca vaṭṭetvā katā eka vaṭṭā vā dvi vaṭṭā

original: vā saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ. Suttaṃ pana avaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ makacivākanāḷikerahīrā
analyzed: vā saṅghassa dinna kālataḥ paṭṭhāya garu bhaṇḍam suttam pana avaṭṭetvā dinnam maka civāka nāḷikera hīrā

original: ca bhājanīyā. Yehi panetāni rajjukayottādīni dinnāni honti, te attano karaṇīyena
analyzed: ca bhājanīyāḥ dinnāni honti te karaṇīyena

original: harantā na vāretabbā.
analyzed: harantā na vāretabbā

original: Yo koci antamaso aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍakamattopi veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako
analyzed: yaḥ koci antamasaḥ aṭṭhaṅgula sūci daṇḍaka mattaḥ api saṅghassa dinnaḥ vā tattha jātakaḥ

original: vā rakkhitagopito garubhaṇḍaṃ, sopi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atireko puggalikakamme
analyzed: vā rakkhita gopitaḥ garu bhaṇḍam saḥ api saṅgha kamme ca cetiya kamme ca kate atirekaḥ puggalika kamme

original: ca dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Pādagaṇhanakatelanāḷi pana kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanadaṇḍako chattadaṇḍako
analyzed: ca dātum vaṭṭati pana upāhana daṇḍako chatta daṇḍako

original: chattasalākāti idamettha bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ. Daḍḍhagehamanussā gaṇhitvā gacchantā na
analyzed: chatta salākā ati idam ettha bhājanīya bhaṇḍam daḍḍha geha manussāḥ gaṇhitvā gacchantā na

original: vāretabbā. Rakkhitagopitaṃ veḷuṃ gaṇhantena samakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā thāvaraṃ antamaso
analyzed: vāretabbā rakkhita gopitam veḷum gaṇhantena samakam vā atirekam vā thāvaram antamasaḥ

original: taṃagghanakavallikāyapi phātikammaṃ katvā gahetabbo, phātikammaṃ akatvā gaṇhantena
analyzed: phāti kammam katvā gahetabbaḥ phāti kammam a katvā gaṇhantena

original: tattheva vaḷañjetabbo. Gamanakāle saṅghike āvāse ṭhapetvā gantabbaṃ, asatiyā gahetvā
analyzed: tattha iva vaḷañjetabbaḥ gamana kāle saṅghike āvāse ṭhapetvā gantabbam asatiyā gahetvā

original: gatena pahiṇitvā dātabbo. Desantaragatena sampattavihāro saṅghikāvāse ṭhapetabbo.
analyzed: gatena pahiṇitvā dātabbaḥ desa antara gatena sampatta vihāraḥ saṅghikā vāse ṭhapetabbo

original: Tiṇanti muñjañca pabbajañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ yaṃ kiñci tiṇaṃ. Yattha pana tiṇaṃ
analyzed: tiṇanti muñjam ca pabbajam ca ṭhapetvā avasesam yam kiñci tiṇam yattha pana tiṇam

original: natthi, tattha paṇṇehi chādenti, tasmā paṇṇampi tiṇeneva saṅgahitaṃ. Iti muñjādīsu

original: nāmañceva āpatti ca gahitā hoti. Tasmā etesu yassa kassaci vasena kammavācā kātabbā.
analyzed: nāman ca iva āpatti ca gahitā hoti tasmai etesu yassa kassaci vasena kamma vācā kātabbā

original: Idha pana sabbāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇavasena sambahulanayeneva ca sabbattha kammavācaṃ
analyzed: idha pana sabba āpattīnam sādhāraṇa vasena sambahula nayena iva ca sabbattha kamma vācam

original: yojetvā dassayissāma. Ekañhi āpattiṃ āpajjitvā “sambahulā”ti vinayakammaṃ karontassapi
analyzed: yojetvā dassayissāmaḥ ekam hi āpattim āpajjitvā sambahulā ati vinaya kammam karontassa api

original: vuṭṭhāti ekaṃ vinā sambahulānaṃ abhāvato. Sambahulā pana āpajjitvā “ekaṃ āpajji”nti
analyzed: vuṭṭhāti ekam vinā sambahulānam abhāvataḥ sambahulā pana āpajjitvā ekam āpajjinti

original: karontassa na vuṭṭhāti, tasmā sambahulanayeneva yojayissāma. Seyyathidaṃ – paṭicchannaparivāsaṃ
analyzed: karontassa na vuṭṭhāti tasmai sambahula nayena iva yojayissāma seyyathidam paṭicchanna parivāsam

original: dentena sace ekāhappaṭicchannā āpatti hoti.
analyzed: dentena sace ekāha ppaṭicchannā āpatti hoti

original: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ
analyzed: aham bhante sambahulāḥ āpattiyaḥ āpajjim eka aha ppaṭicchannāyaḥ saḥ ham bhante saṅgham

analyzed: sambahulānam āpattīnam eka aha ppaṭicchannānam eka aha parivāsam yācāmi aham bhante

original: sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, dutiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ

original: ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācāmīti –
analyzed: eka aha parivāsam yācāmi iti

original: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā –
analyzed: evam tikkhattum yācāpetvā

original: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ ayam itthannāmaḥ bhikkhu sambahulāḥ āpattiyaḥ āpajji eka aha ppaṭicchannāyaḥ

analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ ayam itthannāmaḥ bhikkhu sambahulāḥ āpattiyaḥ āpajji eka aha ppaṭicchannāyaḥ

original: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācati, saṅgho

original: “Dutiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi…pe… tatiyampi etamatthaṃ vadāmi…pe….

original: “Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāso, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –

original: Evaṃ yo yo āpanno hoti, tassa tassa nāmaṃ gahetvā kammavācā kātabbā.
analyzed: evam yaḥ yaḥ āpannaḥ hoti tassa tassa nāmam gahetvā kamma vācā kātabbā

original: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca tena bhikkhunā māḷakasīmāyameva “parivāsaṃ samādiyāmi, vattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti vattaṃ samādātabbaṃ, samādiyitvā tattheva saṅghassa ārocetabbaṃ. Ārocentena ca –
analyzed: kamma vācā pariyosāne ca tena bhikkhunā māḷakasīmāyam eva parivāsam samādiyāmi vattam samādiyāmi iti vattam samādātabbam samādiyitvā tattha iva saṅghassa ārocetabbam ārocentena ca

original: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
analyzed: aham bhante sambahulāḥ āpattiyaḥ āpajjim eka aha ppaṭicchannāyaḥ saḥ ham saṅgham sambahulānam

original: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
analyzed: āpattīnam eka aha paṭicchannānam eka aha parivāsam tassa me saṅghaḥ sambahulānam

original: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasāmi, vediyāmahaṃ,
analyzed: āpattīnam ekāha paṭicchannānam ekāha parivāsam adāsi saḥ ham parivasāmi

original: bhante, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti –
analyzed: bhante vediyatī iti mamam saṅghaḥ dhāretu uti

original: Evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Imañca atthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci vācāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
analyzed: evam ārocetabbam imam ca attham gahetvā yāya kāyaci vācāya ārocetum vaṭṭatiyā iva

original: Ārocetvā sace nikkhipitukāmo hoti, “parivāsaṃ nikkhipāmi, vattaṃ nikkhipāmī”ti nikkhipitabbaṃ.

original: Ekapadenapi cettha nikkhitto hoti parivāso, dvīhi pana sunikkhittoyeva. Samādānepi
analyzed: eka padena api ca ittha nikkhittaḥ hoti parivāsaḥ dvīhi pana su nikkhittaḥ yeva samādāne pi

original: eseva nayo. Nikkhittakālato paṭṭhāya pakatattaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Māḷakato bhikkhūsu

original: sahagacchantassa santike nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace sopi pakkanto, aññassa yassa māḷake

analyzed: na ārocitam tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbam ārocentena ca avasāne vediyati iti mama āyasmā

original: dhāretū”ti vattabbaṃ. Dvinnaṃ ārocentena “āyasmantā dhārentū”ti, tiṇṇaṃ ārocentena

original: Evaṃ kammavācā kātabbā.
analyzed: evam kamma vācā kātabbā

original: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca tena bhikkhunā māḷakasīmāyameva “mānattaṃ samādiyāmi, vattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti vattaṃ samādātabbaṃ, samādiyitvā tattheva saṅghassa ārocetabbaṃ. Ārocentena ca –
analyzed: kamma vācā pariyosāne ca tena bhikkhunā māḷakasīmāyam eva mānattam samādiyāmi vattam samādiyāmi iti vattam samādātabbam samādiyitvā tattha iva saṅghassa ārocetabbam ārocentena ca

original: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ
analyzed: aham bhante sambahulāḥ āpattiyaḥ āpajjim eka aha ppaṭicchannāyaḥ saḥ ham saṅgham sambahulānam

original: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ
analyzed: āpattīnam eka aha paṭicchannānam eka aha parivāsam tassa me saṅghaḥ sambahulānam

original: āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ
analyzed: āpattīnam eka aha ppaṭicchannānam eka aha parivāsam adāsi saḥ ham parivuttha parivāsaḥ saṅgham

original: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho
analyzed: sambahulānam āpattīnam eka aha paṭicchannānam chārattam mānattam tassa me saṅghaḥ

original: sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ mānattaṃ
analyzed: sambahulānam āpattīnam eka aha ppaṭicchannānam chārattam mānattam adāsi soham mānattam

original: carāmi, vediyāmahaṃ bhante, vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti –
analyzed: carāmi vediyām aham bhante vediyatī iti mam saṅghaḥ dhāretu uti

original: Evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Imañca pana atthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci vācāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
analyzed: evam ārocetabbam imam ca pana attham gahetvā yāya kāyaci vācāya ārocetum vaṭṭatiyā iva

original: Ārocetvā sace nikkhipitukāmo hoti, “mānattaṃ nikkhipāmi, vattaṃ nikkhipāmī”ti saṅghamajjhe
analyzed: ārocetvā sace nikkhipitu kāmaḥ hoti mā anattam nikkhipāmi vattam nikkhipāmi iti saṅgha majjhe

original: nikkhipitabbaṃ. Māḷakato bhikkhūsu nikkhantesu ekassapi santike nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: nikkhipitabbam māḷakataḥ bhikkhūsu nikkhantesu ekassa api santike nikkhipitum vaṭṭati

original: Māḷakato nikkhamitvā satiṃ paṭilabhantena sahagacchantassa santike nikkhipitabbaṃ.
analyzed: māḷakataḥ nikkhamitvā satim paṭilabhantena saha gacchantassa santike nikkhipitabbam

original: Sace sopi pakkanto, aññassa yassa māḷake nārocitaṃ, tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ.
analyzed: sace so api pakkantaḥ aññassa yassa māḷake na ārocitam tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbam

original: Ārocentena pana avasāne “vediyatīti maṃ āyasmā dhāretū”ti vattabbaṃ. Dvinnaṃ ārocentena
analyzed: ārocentena pana avasāne vediyati iti mam āyasmai dhāretu uti vattabbam dvinnam ārocentena

original: “āyasmantā dhārentū”ti, tiṇṇaṃ ārocentena “āyasmanto dhārentū”ti vattabbaṃ. Nikkhittakālato
analyzed: āyasmantā dhārentu iti tiṇṇam ārocentena āyasmantaḥ dhārentu iti vattabbam nikkhitta kālataḥ

original: paṭṭhāya pakatattaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Sace appabhikkhuko vihāro hoti, sabhāgā bhikkhū
analyzed: paṭṭhāya pakatatta ṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati sace appabhikkhukaḥ vihāraḥ hoti sabhāgāḥ bhikkhū

original: vasanti, vattaṃ anikkhipitvā antovihāreyeva rattiyo gaṇetabbā. Atha na sakkā sodhetuṃ,
analyzed: vasanti vattam a nikkhipitvā antovihāreya iva rattiyaḥ gaṇetabbāḥ atha na sakkā sodhetum

original: vuttanayeneva vattaṃ nikkhipitvā paccūsasamaye catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
analyzed: vutta nayena iva vattam nikkhipitvā paccūsa samaye catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ

original: parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepato, aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve
analyzed: parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepataḥ a parikkhittassa parikkhepa āraha ṭṭhānataḥ dve

original: leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggato okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne
analyzed: leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahā maggataḥ okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchanna ṭhāne

original: nisīditabbaṃ, antoaruṇeyeva vuttanayena vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetabbaṃ. Sace añño
analyzed: nisīditabbam antoaruṇeya iva vutta nayena vattam samādiyitvā ārocetabbam sace aññaḥ

original: koci bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati, sace esa taṃ passati, saddaṃ
analyzed: koci bhikkhu kenacid eva karaṇīyena tam ṭhānam āgacchati sace esa tam passati saddam

original: vāssa suṇāti, ārocetabbaṃ. Anārocentassa ratticchedo ceva vattabhedo ca, atha dvādasahatthaṃ
analyzed: suṇāti ārocetabbam an ārocentassa ratti chedo ca iva vatta bhedo ca atha dvādasa hattham

original: upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva gacchati, ratticchedo hoti eva, vattabhedo pana
analyzed: upacāram okkamitvā a jānantassa iva gacchati ratti chedaḥ hoti eva vatta bhedaḥ pana

original: natthi. Ārocitakālato paṭṭhāya ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā sesehi sati karaṇīye gantumpi
analyzed: natthi ārocita kālataḥ paṭṭhāya ekam bhikkhum ṭhapetvā sesehi sati karaṇīye gantum pi

original: vaṭṭati, aruṇe uṭṭhite tassa bhikkhussa santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace sopi
analyzed: vaṭṭati aruṇe uṭṭhite tassa bhikkhussa santike vattam nikkhipitabbam sace so pi

original: kenaci kammena pure aruṇeyeva gacchati, aññaṃ vihārato nikkhantaṃ vā āgantukaṃ vā
analyzed: kenacid kammena pure aruṇeya iva gacchati aññam vihārataḥ nikkhantam vā āgantukam vā

original: yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati, tassa santike ārocetvā vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ. Ayañca yasmā
analyzed: yam paṭhamam passati tassa santike ārocetvā vattam nikkhipitabbam ayam ca yasmā

original: gaṇassa ārocetvā bhikkhūnañca atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāva vasi, tenassa ūne gaṇe caraṇadoso
analyzed: gaṇassa ārocetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ca atthi bhāvam sallakkhetvā ava vasi tena assa ūne gaṇe caraṇa doso

original: vā vippavāso vā na hoti. Sace na kañci passati, vihāraṃ gantvāpi yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati,
analyzed: vā vippavāsaḥ vā na hoti sace na kañci passati vihāram gantvā api yam paṭhamam passati

original: tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ nikkhittavattassa parihāro.
analyzed: tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbam ayam nikkhitta vattassa parihāraḥ

original: 239. Evaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ caritvā yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho,
analyzed: evam chārattam mānattam akhaṇḍam caritvā yattha siyā vīsati gaṇaḥ bhikkhu saṅgho

analyzed: tattha saḥ bhikkhu abbhetabbaḥ abbhentehi ca paṭhamam abbhāna arahaḥ kātabbaḥ ayaṃ hi

analyzed: tasmā vattam samādāpetabbaḥ vatte samādinne abbhāna arahaḥ hoti tena api vattam samādiyitvā

original: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci, saṅgho
analyzed: saḥ saṅgham sambahulānam āpattīnam eka aha paṭicchannānam eka aha parivāsam yāci saṅghaḥ

analyzed: paṭicchanna parivāsa kathā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: paṭṭhāya anuloma kkamena vā ārocita divasataḥ paṭṭhāya paṭiloma kkamena vā asukam ca

original: asukañca divasaṃ vā pakkhaṃ vā māsaṃ vā saṃvaccharaṃ vā tava suddhabhāvaṃ jānāsī”ti

original: pucchiyamāno “āma, bhante, jānāmi, ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ ahaṃ suddho”ti vadati, tassa
analyzed: pucchiyamānaḥ āma bhante jānāmi ettakam nāma kālam aham suddhaḥ ti vadati tassa

original: dinno suddhantaparivāso cūḷasuddhantoti vuccati.

original: Taṃ gahetvā parivasantena yattakaṃ kālaṃ attano suddhiṃ jānāti, tattakaṃ apanetvā
analyzed: tam gahetvā parivasantena yattakam kālam suddhim jānāti tattakam apanetvā

original: avasesaṃ māsaṃ vā dvemāsaṃ vā parivasitabbaṃ. Sace “māsamattaṃ asuddhomhī”ti sallakkhetvā

analyzed: aggahesi parivasantaḥ ca puna aññam māsam sarati tat pi māsam parivasitabbam eva

original: puna parivāsadānakiccaṃ natthi. Atha “dvemāsaṃ asuddhomhī”ti sallakkhetvā aggahesi,

analyzed: ayam pana ittha vinicchayaḥ yaḥ paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsam gahetvā parivasanto

original: te parivutthadivase ca mānattaciṇṇadivase ca sabbe odhunitvā adivase katvā pacchā
analyzed: te parivuttha divase ca mānattaciṇṇa divase ca sabbe odhunitvā a divase katvā pacchā

original: antarāpatti ūnakapakkhapaṭicchannā, puna pakkhameva parivāso parivasitabbo. Athāpi
analyzed: antarā āpatti ūnaka pakkha paṭicchannā puna pakkham eva parivāsaḥ parivasitabbaḥ atha api

original: antarāpatti pakkhapaṭicchannāva, pakkhameva parivasitabbaṃ. Etenupāyena yāva saṭṭhivassapaṭicchannā

original: parivāsopi vasitabbo.
analyzed: parivāsaḥ api vasitabbo

analyzed: mahāpaduma theraḥ pana āha kasmai atekicchaḥ nāma nanu ayam samuccaya kkhandhakaḥ nāma

original: “Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
analyzed: dinnam saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānam āpattīnam chārattam mānattam khamati saṅghassa tasmā tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Evaṃ kammavācā kātabbā.
analyzed: evam kamma vācā kātabbā

original: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca mānattasamādānādi sabbaṃ vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –
analyzed: kamma vācā pariyosāne ca mānatta samādāna ādi sabbam vutta nayam eva ārocentena pana

original: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
analyzed: abbhitas saṅghena itthannāmaḥ bhikkhu khamati saṅghassa tasmā tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Evaṃ kammavācā kātabbā.
analyzed: evam kamma vācā kātabbā

original: Sace mānattāraho vā mānattaṃ caranto vā abbhānāraho vā anikkhittavatto antarāpattiṃ
analyzed: sace mānattārahaḥ vā mānattam carantaḥ vā abbhāna arahaḥ vā a nikkhitta vattaḥ antarāpattim

original: āpajjitvā paṭicchādeti, vuttanayeneva purimāpattiyā antarāpattiyā ca divasaparicchedaṃ
analyzed: āpajjitvā paṭicchādeti vutta nayena iva purima āpattiyā antara āpattiyā ca divasa paricchedam

original: sallakkhetvā tadanurūpāya kammavācāya mūlāya paṭikassitvā parivāsaṃ datvā parivutthaparivāsassa
analyzed: sallakkhetvā tad anurūpāya kamma vācāya mūlāya paṭikassitvā parivāsam da tvā parivuttha parivāsassa

original: mānattaṃ datvā ciṇṇamānatto abbhetabbo. Sace pana paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivasanto
analyzed: mānattam da tvā ciṇṇa mānattaḥ abbhetabbaḥ sace pana paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivasantaḥ

original: antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā na paṭicchādeti, tassa mūlāyapaṭikassanāyeva kātabbā, puna
analyzed: antarāpattim āpajjitvā na paṭicchādeti tassa mūlāya paṭikassanāya iva kātabbā puna

original: parivāsadānakiccaṃ natthi. Mūlāyapaṭikassanena pana parivutthadivasānaṃ makkhitattā
analyzed: parivāsa dāna kiccam natthi mūlāya paṭikassanena pana parivuttha divasānam makkhita ttā

original: puna ādito paṭṭhāya parivasitabbaṃ. Parivutthaparivāsassa ca mūlāpattiyā antarāpattiṃ
analyzed: puna āditaḥ paṭṭhāya parivasitabbam parivuttha parivāsassa ca mūlāpattiyāḥ antarāpattim

original: samodhānetvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ, ciṇṇamānatto ca abbhetabbo. Kathaṃ? Mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ
analyzed: samodhānetvā mānattam dātabbam ciṇṇa mānattaḥ ca katham mūlāya paṭikassanam

original: karontena tāva sace mūlāpatti pakkhapaṭicchannā hoti,
analyzed: karontena tāva sace mūla āpatti pakkha paṭicchannā hoti

original: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pakkhapaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ

analyzed: āpattīnam pakkha paṭicchannānam pakkha parivāsam yācim tassa me saṅghaḥ sambahulānam

original: ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā…pe… evamassa vacanīyo –

original: āgacchati, no suttavibhaṅgo, so atthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhati,
analyzed: āgacchati no sutta vibhaṅgo saḥ attham a saṃlakkhetvā byañjana chāyāya attham paṭibāhati

original: yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā”ti –
analyzed: yadā ayasmantānam pattakallam itthannāmam bhikkhum vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesāḥ imam adhikaraṇam vūpasameyyāma ati

original: Evaṃ ubbāhikavinicchaye dhammakathikassa bhikkhuno nissāraṇā nissāraṇā nāma.
analyzed: evam ubbāhika vinicchaye dhamma kathikassa bhikkhuno nissāraṇā nissāraṇā nāma

original: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ajjuposatho pannaraso, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti –
analyzed: suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ ajjuposathaḥ panna rasaḥ yadi saṅghassa patta kallam saṅghaḥ uposatham kareyya ati

original: Evaṃ uposathakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti uposatho nāma.
analyzed: evam uposatha kamma vasena ṭhapitā uposathaḥ nāma

original: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ajja pavāraṇā pannarasī, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho pavāreyyā”ti –

original: Evaṃ pavāraṇakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti pavāraṇā nāma.
analyzed: evam pavāraṇa kamma vasena ṭhapitā pavāraṇā nāma

analyzed: itthannāmaḥ itthannāmam anusāseyyāti yadi saṅghassa patta kallam aham itthannāmaṃ

original: saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyyā”ti –
analyzed: saṅghassa patta kallam itthannāmaḥ itthannāmena vinayam puṭṭhaḥ vissajjeyya

original: Evaṃ āpattipaṭiggaho paṭiggaho nāma.

analyzed: suṇantu me āyasmantāḥ āvāsikāḥ yat āyasmantānam patta kallam idāni uposatham kareyyāma pātimokkham uddiseyyāma āgame kāḷe pavāreyyāma ati

original: “Suṇantu me āyasmantā āvāsikā, yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, idāni uposathaṃ kareyyāma, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāma, āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā”ti –

original: Evaṃ katā pavāraṇāpaccukkaḍḍhanā paccukkaḍḍhanā nāma.

original: Tathā tato parā ekekasmiṃ pakkhe ekekaṃ katvā dve ñattiyo. Iti yathāvuttappabhedaṃ osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ…pe… kammalakkhaṇaññeva navamanti ñattikammaṃ imāni nava ṭhānāni gacchati.

original: “Ukkujjito saṅghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto sambhogo saṅghena, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti.

original: “Na, bhikkhave, viggayha parikammaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ, yo kārāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato aññamaññaṃ sarīrena ghaṃsituṃ na vaṭṭati.

original: “Na, bhikkhave, mallakena nahāyitabbaṃ, yo nahāyeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi,
analyzed: na bhikkhave mallakena nahāyitabbam yaḥ nahāyeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa anujānāmi

original: bhikkhave, gilānassa akatamallaka”nti vacanato makaradaṇḍake chinditvā mallakamūlasaṇṭhānena
analyzed: bhikkhave gilānassa akata mallakan ti vacanataḥ makara daṇḍake chinditvā mallaka mūla saṇṭhānena

original: kataṃ “mallaka”nti vuccati, idaṃ gilānassapi na vaṭṭati. Akatamallakaṃ nāma dante
analyzed: katam mallakanti vuccati idam gilānassa api na vaṭṭati akatamallakam nāma dante

original: acchinditvā kataṃ, idaṃ agilānassa na vaṭṭati, iṭṭhakakhaṇḍaṃ pana kapālakhaṇḍaṃ vā vaṭṭati.
analyzed: a chinditvā katam idam agilānassa na vaṭṭati iṭṭhaka khaṇḍam pana kapāla khaṇḍam vā vaṭṭati

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ukkāsikaṃ puthupāṇika”nti vacanato ukkāsikaṃ puthupāṇikañca
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave ukkāsikam puthu pāṇikam ti vacanataḥ ukkāsikam puthu pāṇikam ca

original: vaṭṭati. Ukkāsikaṃ nāma vatthavaṭṭi, tasmā nahāyantassa yassa kassaci nahānasāṭakavaṭṭiyā
analyzed: vaṭṭati ukkāsikam nāma vattha vaṭṭi tasmā nahāyantassa yassa kassaci nahāna sāṭaka vaṭṭiyā

original: piṭṭhiṃ ghaṃsituṃ vaṭṭati. Puthupāṇikanti hatthaparikammaṃ vuccati, tasmā sabbesaṃ
analyzed: piṭṭhim ghaṃsitum vaṭṭati puthu pāṇikam ti hattha parikammam vuccati tasmā sabbesam

original: hatthena piṭṭhiparikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: hatthena piṭṭhi parikammam kātum vaṭṭati

original: Idaṃ panettha nahānavattaṃ – udakatitthaṃ gantvā yattha vā tattha vā cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā
analyzed: idam pana ittha nahānavattam udaka tittham gantvā yattha vā tattha vā cīvaram nikkhipitvā

original: vegena ṭhitakeneva na otaritabbaṃ, sabbadisā pana oloketvā vivittabhāvaṃ ñatvā khāṇugumbalatādīni
analyzed: vegena ṭhitakena iva na otaritabbam sabbadisā pana oloketvā vivitta bhāvam ñatvā khāṇu gumba latā ādīni

original: vavatthapetvā tikkhattuṃ ukkāsitvā avakujja ṭhitena uttarāsaṅgacīvaraṃ apanetvā pasāretabbaṃ,
analyzed: vavatthapetvā tikkhattum ukkāsitvā avakujja ṭhitena uttarāsaṅga cīvaram apanetvā pasāretabbam

original: kāyabandhanaṃ mocetvā cīvarapiṭṭheyeva ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace udakasāṭikā natthi, udakante
analyzed: kāya bandhanam mocetvā cīvara piṭṭheyeva ṭhapetabbam sace udaka sāṭikā natthi udaka ante

original: ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā nivāsanaṃ mocetvā sace ninnaṭṭhānaṃ atthi, ātape pasāretabbaṃ.
analyzed: ukkuṭikam nisīditvā nivāsanam mocetvā sace ninna ṭṭhānam atthi ātape pasāretabbam

original: No ce atthi, saṃharitvā ṭhapetabbaṃ. Otarantena saṇikaṃ nābhippamāṇamattaṃ otaritvā
analyzed: no ce atthi saṃharitvā ṭhapetabbam otarantena saṇikam nābhi ppamāṇa mattam otaritvā

original: vīciṃ anuṭṭhapentena saddaṃ akarontena nivattitvā āgatadisābhimukhena nimujjitabbaṃ,
analyzed: vīcim anuṭṭhapentena saddam a karontena nivattitvā āgata disa abhimukhena nimujjitabbam

original: evaṃ cīvaraṃ rakkhitaṃ hoti. Ummujjantenapi saddaṃ akarontena saṇikaṃ ummujjitvā
analyzed: evam cīvaram rakkhitam hoti ummujjantena api saddam a karontena saṇikam ummujjitvā

original: nahānapariyosāne udakante ukkuṭikena nisīditvā nivāsanaṃ parikkhipitvā uṭṭhāya suparimaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: nahāna pariyosāne uda kante ukkuṭikena nisīditvā nivāsanam parikkhipitvā uṭṭhāya su parimaṇḍalam

original: nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvāva ṭhātabbaṃ.
analyzed: nivāsetvā kāya bandhanam bandhitvā cīvaram ṭhātabbam

original: 22. “Na, bhikkhave, vallikā dhāretabbā… na pāmaṅgo dhāretabbo… na kaṇṭhasuttakaṃ
analyzed: na bhikkhave vallikā dhāretabbā na pāmaṅgaḥ dhāretabbaḥ na kaṇṭha suttakam

original: dhāretabbaṃ… na kaṭisuttakaṃ dhāretabbaṃ… na ovaṭṭikaṃ dhāretabbaṃ… na kāyūraṃ dhāretabbaṃ…
analyzed: dhāretabbam na kaṭisuttakam dhāretabbam na ovaṭṭikam dhāretabbam na kāyūram dhāretabbam

original: na hatthābharaṇaṃ dhāretabbaṃ… na aṅgulimuddikā dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
analyzed: na hattha ābharaṇam dhāretabbam na aṅguli muddikā dhāretabbā yaḥ dhāreyya āpatti dukkaṭassa ati

original: vacanato kaṇṇapiḷandhanādi yaṃ kiñci ābharaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati. Tattha vallikāti kaṇṇato
analyzed: vacanataḥ kaṇṇa piḷandhana ādi yam kiñci ābharaṇam na vaṭṭati tattha vallikā ati kaṇṇataḥ

original: nikkhantamuttolambakādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Na kevalañca vallikā eva, yaṃ kiñci
analyzed: etam adhivacanam na kevalam ca vallikāḥ eva yam kiñci

original: kaṇṇapiḷandhanaṃ antamaso tālapaṇṇampi na vaṭṭati. Pāmaṅganti yaṃ kiñci palambakasuttaṃ.
analyzed: kaṇṇa piḷandhanam antamasaḥ tāla paṇṇam pi na vaṭṭati pāmaṅganti yam kiñci palambaka suttam

original: Kaṇṭhasuttakanti yaṃ kiñci gīvūpagaṃ ābharaṇaṃ. Kaṭisuttakanti yaṃ kiñci kaṭipiḷandhanaṃ,
analyzed: kaṇṭha suttakam ti yam kiñci gīvūpagam ābharaṇam kaṭi suttakam ti yam kiñci kaṭi piḷandhanam

original: antamaso suttatantumattampi. Ovaṭṭikanti valayaṃ. Kāyūrādīni pākaṭāneva.
analyzed: valayam kāyūra ādīni

original: 23. “Na, bhikkhave, dīghā kesā dhāretabbā, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi,
analyzed: na bhikkhave dīghā kesā dhāretabbā yaḥ dhāreyya āpatti dukkaṭassa anujānāmi

original: bhikkhave, dvemāsikaṃ vā duvaṅgulaṃ vā”ti vacanato sace kesā antodvemāse dvaṅgulaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhave dvemāsikam vā duvaṅgulam vā ati vacanato sace kesāḥ antar dve māse dvaṅgulam

original: pāpuṇanti, antodvemāseyeva chinditabbā, dvaṅgulehi atikkāmetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sacepi
analyzed: pāpuṇanti chinditabbā dvi aṅgulehi atikkāmetum na vaṭṭati sace pi

original: na dīghā, dvemāsato ekadivasampi atikkāmetuṃ na labhatiyeva. Ubhayathāpi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedova
analyzed: na dīghā dve māsataḥ eka divasam pi atikkāmetum na ubhayathā api

original: vutto, tato oraṃ pana na vaṭṭanabhāvo nāma natthi.
analyzed: vutto tatas oram pana na vaṭṭana bhāvaḥ nāma natthi

original: “Na, bhikkhave, kattarikāya kesā chedāpetabbā, yo chedāpeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: na bhikkhave kattarikāya kesā chedāpetabbā yaḥ chedāpeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ābādhapaccayā kattarikāya kese chedāpetu”nti vacanato ābādhaṃ
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave ābādha paccayā kattarikāya kese chedāpetunti vacanataḥ ābādham

original: vinā kattarikāya kese chedāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: vinā kattarikāya kese chedāpetum na vaṭṭati

original: “Na, bhikkhave, kocchena kesā osaṇṭhetabbā… na phaṇakena kesā osaṇṭhetabbā… na hatthaphaṇakena
analyzed: na bhikkhave kocchena kesāḥ osaṇṭhetabbāḥ na phaṇakena kesāḥ osaṇṭhetabbāḥ na hattha phaṇakena

original: kesā osaṇṭhetabbā… na sitthatelakena kesā osaṇṭhetabbā… na udakatelakena kesā osaṇṭhetabbā,
analyzed: kesāḥ osaṇṭhetabbāḥ na sittha telakena kesāḥ osaṇṭhetabbāḥ na udaka telakena kesāḥ osaṇṭhetabbā

analyzed: yaḥ osaṇṭheyyaḥ āpatti dukkaṭassa ti vacanataḥ maṇḍana atthāya koccha ādīhi kesāḥ na osaṇṭhetabbā

original: uddhalomena pana anulomanipātanatthaṃ hatthaṃ temetvā sīsaṃ puñchitabbaṃ, uṇhābhitattarajasirānampi
analyzed: uddhalomena pana anuloma nipātana attham hattham temetvā sīsam puñchitabbam

original: allahatthena puñchituṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: allahatthena puñchitum vaṭṭati

original: 24. “Na, bhikkhave, ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṃ oloketabbaṃ, yo olokeyya,
analyzed: na bhikkhave ādāse vā udaka patte vā mukha nimittam oloketabbam yaḥ olokeyya

original: āpatti dukkaṭassa. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ābādhapaccayā ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṃ
analyzed: āpatti dukkaṭassa anujānāmi bhikkhave ābādha paccayā ādāse vā udaka patte vā mukha nimittam

original: oloketu”nti vacanato ābādhaṃ vinā ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhaṃ na oloketabbaṃ. Ettha
analyzed: oloketum ti vacanataḥ ābādham vinā ādāse vā udaka patte vā mukham na oloketabbam ettha

original: ca kaṃsapattādīnipi yesu mukhanimittaṃ paññāyati, sabbāni ādāsasaṅkhameva gacchanti,
analyzed: ca kaṃsa patta ādīni pi yesu mukha nimittam paññāyati sabbāni ādāsa saṅkham eva gacchanti

original: kañjiyādīnipi ca udakapattasaṅkhameva. Tasmā yattha katthaci olokentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
analyzed: ca udaka patta saṅkham eva tasmā yattha katthaci olokentassa dukkaṭam

original: Ābādhapaccayā pana “sañchavi nu kho me vaṇo, udāhu na tāvā”ti jānanatthaṃ vaṭṭati,
analyzed: ābādha paccayā pana sañchavi nu kho me vaṇaḥ udāhu na tāva ati jānana attham vaṭṭati

original: “jiṇṇo nu khomhi, no”ti evaṃ āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokanatthampi vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: jiṇṇaḥ nu kho mhi no ti evam āyu saṅkhāram olokana attham pi vaṭṭati iti vuttam

original: “Na, bhikkhave, mukhaṃ ālimpitabbaṃ… na mukhaṃ ummadditabbaṃ… na mukhaṃ cuṇṇetabbaṃ…
analyzed: na bhikkhave mukham ālimpitabbam na mukham ummadditabbam na mukham cuṇṇetabbam

original: na manosilikāya mukhaṃ lañchetabbaṃ… na aṅgarāgo kātabbo… na mukharāgo kātabbo… na
analyzed: na manosilikāya mukham lañchetabbam na aṅga rāgaḥ kātabbaḥ na mukha rāgaḥ kātabbaḥ na

analyzed: aṅga rāga mukha rāgaḥ kātabbaḥ yaḥ kareyya āpatti dukkaṭassa anujānāmi bhikkhave ābādha paccayā

analyzed: mukham ālimpitum ti vacanataḥ ābādham vinā mukha vilimpana ādi na kātabbam

original: 25. “Na, bhikkhave, naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gantabbaṃ, yo gaccheyya,
analyzed: na bhikkhave naccam vā gītam vā vāditam vā dassanāya gantabbam yaḥ gaccheyya

analyzed: āpatti dukkaṭassa ati vacanataḥ nacca ādim dassanāya na gantabbam ettha ca naccanti

analyzed: naṭa ādayaḥ vā naccantu soṇḍāḥ vā antamasaḥ morasūva makkaṭa ādayaḥ api sabbam etam naccam eva

analyzed: tasmai antamasaḥ mora naccampi dassanāya gacchantassa dukkaṭam sayam pi naccantassa

analyzed: rata nattaya guṇa upasañhitam sādhu kīḷita gītam vā asaññata bhikkhūnam dhamma bhāṇaka gītam

analyzed: vā antamasaḥ danta gītam pi yam gāyissāma ati pubbabhāge okūjantā karonti sabbam etam

original: gītameva, sayaṃ gāyantassapi gāyāpentassapi dukkaṭameva.
analyzed: gītam eva sayam gāyantassa api dukkaṭam eva

original: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṃ gāyantassa. Attanāpi tasmiṃ
analyzed: pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavāḥ āyatakena gītassarena dhammam gāyantassa attanā api tasmin

analyzed: sare sārajjati pare pi tasmin sare sārajjanti gahapatikā api ujjhāyanti

original: nikāmayamānassa samādhissa bhaṅgo hoti, pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati. Ime
analyzed: nikāmayamānassa samādhissa bhaṅgaḥ hoti pacchimā janatā diṭṭha anugatim āpajjati ime

original: kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṃ gāyantassa. Na, bhikkhave,
analyzed: kho bhikkhave pañca ādīnavāḥ āyatakena gītassarena dhammam gāyantassa na bhikkhave

analyzed: āyatakena gītassarena dhammaḥ gāyitabbo yaḥ gāyeyya āpatti dukkaṭassa ati

original: Vacanato āyatakena gītassarena dhammopi na gāyitabbo.
analyzed: vacanataḥ āyatakena gīta ssarena dhammaḥ api na gāyitabbaḥ

original: Āyatako nāma gītassaro taṃ taṃ vattaṃ bhinditvā akkharāni vināsetvā pavatto. Dhamme
analyzed: āyatakaḥ nāma gīta ssaraḥ tam tam vattam bhinditvā akkharāni vināsetvā pavattaḥ dhamme

original: pana suttantavattaṃ nāma atthi, jātakavattaṃ nāma atthi, gāthāvattaṃ nāma atthi,
analyzed: pana suttanta vattam nāma atthi jātaka vattam nāma atthi gāthā vattam nāma atthi

original: taṃ vināsetvā atidīghaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, caturassena vattena parimaṇḍalāni padabyañjanāni
analyzed: tam vināsetvā ati dīgham kātum na vaṭṭati catur assena vattena parimaṇḍalāni pada byañjanāni

original: dassetabbāni. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sarabhañña”nti vacanato pana sarena dhammaṃ
analyzed: dassetabbāni anujānāmi bhikkhave sarabhaññanti vacanataḥ pana sarena dhammaṃ

original: bhaṇituṃ vaṭṭati. Sarabhaññe kira taraṅgavattadhotakavattagalitavattādīni dvattiṃsa
analyzed: bhaṇitum vaṭṭati sarabhaññe kira taraṅgavatta dhotakavatta galitavatta ādīni dvattiṃsa

original: vattāni atthi, tesu yaṃ icchati, taṃ kātuṃ labhati. Sabbesaṃ padabyañjanaṃ avināsetvā
analyzed: vattāni atthi tesu yam icchati tam kātum labhati sabbesam pada byañjanam a vināsetvā

original: vikāraṃ akatvā samaṇasāruppena caturassena nayena pavattanaṃyeva lakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: vikāram a katvā samaṇa sāruppena caturassena nayena lakkhaṇam

original: Vāditaṃ nāma tantibaddhādivādanīyabhaṇḍaṃ vāditaṃ vā hotu kuṭabherivāditaṃ vā antamaso
analyzed: vāditam nāma tantibaddha ādi vādanīya bhaṇḍam vāditam vā hotu kuṭabheri vāditam vā

original: udakabherivāditampi, sabbametaṃ na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana niṭṭhubhanto vā sāsaṅke vā ṭhito
analyzed: udaka bheri vāditam pi sabbam etam na vaṭṭati yam pana niṭṭhubhantaḥ vā sa āsaṅke vā ṭhitaḥ

original: accharikaṃ vā phoṭeti, pāṇiṃ vā paharati, tattha anāpatti, sabbaṃ antarārāme ṭhitassa
analyzed: accharikam vā phoṭeti pāṇim vā paharati tattha anāpatti sabbam antarārāme ṭhitassa

original: passato anāpatti, passissāmīti vihārato vihāraṃ gacchantassa āpattiyeva. Āsanasālāyaṃ
analyzed: passataḥ anāpatti passissāmi iti vihārataḥ vihāram gacchantassa āpattiyā iva āsana sālāyam

original: nisinno passati, anāpatti. Passissāmīti uṭṭhahitvā gacchato āpatti, vīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā
analyzed: nisinnaḥ passati anāpatti passissāmi iti uṭṭhahitvā gacchato āpatti vīthiyam ṭhatvā

original: gīvaṃ parivattetvā passatopi āpattiyeva. Salākabhattādīnaṃ vā atthāya aññena vā kenaci
analyzed: gīvam parivattetvā passataḥ pi āpattiyā iva salākabhatta ādīnam vā atthāya aññena vā kenacid

original: karaṇīyena gantvā gataṭṭhāne passati vā suṇāti vā, anāpatti. Āpadāsu tādisena upaddavena
analyzed: karaṇīyena gantvā gata ṭṭhāne passati vā suṇāti vā anāpatti āpadāsu tādisena upaddavena

original: upadduto samajjaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati, evaṃ pavisitvā passantassa suṇantassa vā anāpatti.
analyzed: upaddutaḥ samajja ṭṭhānam pavisati evam pavisitvā passantassa suṇantassa vā anāpatti

original: “Cetiyassa upahāraṃ detha upāsakā”ti vattumpi, “tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upahāraṃ karomā”ti
analyzed: cetiyassa upahāram detha upāsaka ati vattum pi tumhākam cetiyassa upahāram karoma ati

original: vutte sampaṭicchitumpi na labhati. “Tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ karomā”ti vutte
analyzed: vutte sampaṭicchitum pi na labhati tumhākam cetiyassa upaṭṭhānam karoma ati vutte

original: pana “upaṭṭhānakaraṇaṃ nāma sundara”nti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: pana upaṭṭhāna karaṇam nāma sundaran ti vattum vaṭṭati

original: 26. “Na, bhikkhave, attano aṅgajātaṃ chetabbaṃ, yo chindeyya, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti
analyzed: na bhikkhave attanaḥ aṅga jātam chetabbam yaḥ chindeyya āpatti thullaccayassa ati

original: 27. “Na, bhikkhave, gihīnaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetabbaṃ, yo
analyzed: na bhikkhave gihīnam uttari manussa dhammam iddhi pāṭihāriyam dassetabbam yaḥ

analyzed: dasseyya āpatti dukkaṭassa ati vacanataḥ gihīnam vikubba niddhim dassetum na vaṭṭati

analyzed: adhiṭṭhāniddhi pana appaṭikkhittā

original: 28. “Na, bhikkhave, sovaṇṇamayo patto dhāretabbo…pe… na rūpiyamayo…pe… na maṇimayo…pe…

analyzed: na veḷuriya mayope na phalika mayope na kaṃsa mayope na kāca mayope na tipu mayope

analyzed: na sīsa maya upe na tamba loha mayaḥ pattaḥ dhāretabbaḥ yaḥ dhāreyya āpatti dukkaṭassa ati

analyzed: byañjanam katvā upanāmenti na vaṭṭati phalika maya kāca maya kaṃsa mayāni

original: vaṭṭati. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dve patte ayopattaṃ mattikāpatta”nti dveyeva ca pattā anuññātā.

analyzed: vacanataḥ lābu kaṭāham pariharitum na vaṭṭati tam labhitvā pana tāvakālikam paribhuñjitum

analyzed: vaṭṭati ghaṭi kaṭāhe pi eṣa iva nayaḥ

analyzed: tayaḥ daṇḍa ādhārake dve patte upari upari ṭhapetum vaṭṭati iti kurundiyam vuttam mahā aṭṭhakathāyam

analyzed: pana vuttam bhūmi ādhārake tiṇṇam pattānam anokāsaḥ dve ṭhapetum vaṭṭati dāru ādhāraka daṇḍa ādhārakesu pi

original: susajjitesu eseva nayo. Bhamakoṭisadiso pana dāruādhārako tīhi daṇḍakehi baddho,

analyzed: bhūmiyam pana nikkujjitvā ekam eva ṭhapetabbanti

analyzed: vacanataḥ bāhira passe katāya tanu kamiḍḍhikāya ante pi esa iva nayaḥ anujānāmi bhikkhave

original: “Na, bhikkhave, patto laggetabbo, yo laggeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato nāgadantādīsu yattha katthaci laggetuṃ na vaṭṭati, cīvaravaṃsepi bandhitvā ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati.

analyzed: sūcim vā kuñcikāya avāpuritum na labhati aṃsakūṭe pana pattam laggetvā yathāsukham avāpuritum labhati

analyzed: na ca bhikkhave sabbapaṃsukūlikena bhavitabbam yaḥ bhaveyya āpatti dukkaṭassa ati

analyzed: parissāvanam a dātum na vaṭṭati yaḥ pana attanaḥ hatthe parissāvane vijjamāne api yācati

analyzed: parissāvanam vā dhamma karaṇam vā saṅghāṭi kaṇṇaḥ adhiṭṭhātabbaḥ iminā parissāvetvā pivissāmi iti

analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave daṇḍa parissāvanam ti vacanataḥ daṇḍa parissāvanam pi vaṭṭati

original: Daṇḍaparissāvanaṃ nāma yattha rajakānaṃ khāraparissāvanaṃ viya catūsu pādesu baddhanisseṇikāya
analyzed: daṇḍa parissāvanam nāma yattha rajakānam khāra parissāvanam viya catūsu pādesu baddha nisseṇikāya

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ottharaka”nti vacanato ottharakaṃ parissāvanampi vaṭṭati.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave ottharakam ti vacanato ottharakam parissāvanam pi vaṭṭati

analyzed: ottharakam nāma yam udake ottharitvā ghaṭakena udakam gaṇhanti tam hi catūsu daṇḍakesu

analyzed: vattham bandhitvā udake cattāraḥ khāṇuke nikhanitvā tesu bandhitvā

analyzed: udakataḥ mocetvā majjhe ottharitvā ghaṭena udakam gaṇhanti

original: 31. “Na, bhikkhave, naggena naggo abhivādetabbo, yo abhivādeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādivacanato

original: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tisso paṭicchādiyo jantāgharapaṭicchādiṃ udakapaṭicchādiṃ

analyzed: vattha paṭicchādi ti vacanato tisso paṭicchādiyaḥ vaṭṭanti ettha ca jantā ghara paṭicchādi

original: udakapaṭicchādi ca parikammaṃ karontasseva vaṭṭati, sesesu abhivādanādīsu na vaṭṭati.

original: Vatthapaṭicchādi pana sabbakammesu vaṭṭati.
analyzed: vattha paṭicchādi pana sabba kammesu vaṭṭati

original: 32. “Na, bhikkhave, pupphābhikiṇṇesu sayanesu sayitabbaṃ, yo saseyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti

analyzed: haṃsa mora ādīnam sabba sakuṇānam sīha ādīnam sabba catuppadānam ca lomam pi vaṭṭati piyaṅgu puppha bakula puppha ādīnam

analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave pañca bhisiyaḥ uṇṇa bhisim coḷa bhisim vāka bhisim tiṇa bhisim

original: paṇṇabhisi”nti vacanato pañcahi uṇṇādīhi pūritā pañca bhisiyo anuññātā. Tūlagaṇanāya
analyzed: paṇṇa bhisinti vacanato pañcahi uṇṇa ādīhi pūritā pañca bhisiyaḥ anuññātā tūla gaṇanāya

analyzed: pana manussa lomam yam kiñci kappiya akappiya maṃsa jātīnam pakkhi catuppadānam lomam sabbam

analyzed: uṇṇa ggahaṇena iva gahitam channam cīvara anam channam anuloma cīvara anam ca

original: aññatarena bhisicchaviṃ katvā taṃ sabbaṃ pakkhipitvā bhisiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Eḷakalomāni
analyzed: aññatarena bhisi chavim katvā tam sabbam pakkhipitvā bhisim kātum vaṭṭati eḷaka lomāni

original: pana apakkhipitvā kambalameva catugguṇaṃ pañcaguṇaṃ vā pakkhipitvā katāpi uṇṇabhisisaṅkhyameva gacchati.

analyzed: veditabbā tamāla pattam pana aññena missam eva vaṭṭati suddham na vaṭṭati yam pana itam

original: Etena masūrakaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ hoti. Bhisiyā pamāṇaniyamo natthi,
analyzed: etena masūrakam paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati iti siddham hoti bhisiyā pamāṇa niyamaḥ natthi

original: mañcabhisi pīṭhabhisi bhūmattharaṇabhisi caṅkamanabhisi pādapuñchanabhisīti etāsaṃ
